1.content: Welcome to Emerald Island home of giant Pokemon. Before we start what is your gender?
1.title: Welcome to Emerald Island

11.content:
Name: Donald
Age:16
Looks: blue eyes, brown hare, blue t-shirt, and jeans
Personality: friendly but very shy
Likes: video games, dogs, and his closest friends
Dislikes: snakes and spiders
11.title: Donald

choices: You go out and see who is is.+
111.content: Your walking down the street when all of a sudden a hole appears under your feet and you find yourself free falling to the earth. Just as you hit the ground you wake up shouting. "It was just a dream." you say to your self in relief. While reaching for your head to wipe the sweat off your forehead you feel that there is a riped piece of cloth raped around your head and also you find several bruises on your arms. You look around and you notice two things ,one this is not your room and two every thing is ten times bigger then you. Checking your surroundings you guess your height is about one and a half inches. "What happened to me!" you yell. You then hear noises outside the door. Then...
111.title: Donald's Story.

choices: Get closer to see what their talking about.+
Something is coming down the hall.
1111.content: You decide to go and see where the noises are coming from. You grab a sheet on the bed and used it to slide down ground after words you ran towards the door. The door was closed but you managed to squeezed threw the bottom seam. You where staring down a large hallway with and with a light coming form a room at the end. You hear the voices coming from the room plus you see two shadows cast upon the wall. Listening to the voices one of them is a male and one of them is a female but you still can't make out what their talking about. Then...
1111.title: Go out and see who is is.

choices: You walk up and talk to them.
11111.content:
Being careful not to make noise you hurry towards the room and hide behind the frame. As you peek around the corner you couldn't believe your eyes, you saw a large Floazel and a large Vaporeon siting on the floor talking with each other. Even though you where shocked you still waited to find what was going on. Looking you see two spots on the Floatzel's back telling you that it was a male "So the Vaporeon must be the girl heard" thinking to your self. You stood still listening to their conversation.
(Vaporeon) "I wonder where he came from."
(Floatzel) "I don't know but, it's a good thing we found him or else he wouldn't last long out there."
(Vaporeon) "Do you think he's ok, he's been out for a long time and I'm kinda getting worried."
(Floatzel) "I'm worried too, but Miku told use that his injuries are bandaged and that he'll wake up soon."
(Vaporeon) "Ya I guess your right."
By the way their talking it sounds like they are the ones that brought you here and are very concerned about you. Then...
11111.title: Conversation.

choices: "...Do you know what happend to me"
111112.content: All of a sudden you are lifted into the air, hanging by your shirt. A loud voice behind you says "Big brother, whats this thing.". You then see Floatzel turn his head towards you. "Storm, put him down!" the Floatzel shouted. You feel your self being lowered to the ground, once you where on the ground you turn to see a Buizel looking at you with a sorry expression it's face. You turn back to see both the Vaporeon and the Floatzel staring at you making you feel very uncomfortable. "Are you ok?" the Vaporeon asked with a concerned look on her face. "Y..yes I..I'm ok." you reply shaking in fear. "Don't worry, we won't hurt you" said the Floatzel. Then the Floatzel gently picks you up with his giant paw and places you on the table. "So do you have a name" the Vaporeon asked. "M..my name is Donald" you reply still a little scared. "Pleased to meet you Donald my name is Shiki." said the Vaporion. "My name is Jet" said the Floatzel "and over there is my little brother Storm." pointing at the Buizel which was siting on the floor playing with a ball. You feel a little more at ease now knowing that they don't wish to hurt you. "Hey, can I ask you something?" you ask. "Sure" said Shiki "what do you want to ask." "Well..."
111112.title: Something picks you up.

1111122.content:
(You)"Do you know what happened to me?"
(Jet the Floatzel)"Well we're not sure, we where just resting on the beach when we saw a small blue comet."
(You)"Blue comet? What are you talking about?"
(Shiki the Vaporion) "Well we looked in the sky and saw a strange blue comet falling through the sky and crash on the beach, we went over to see what it was and we found you unconscious where the comet landed."
(Jet) " you where severely beat up and burned so we brought you back home with us and Miku helped us take care of your injures."
(You) "Who's Miku?"
(Shiki) "She is a friend of ours, she is out getting some food and supplies from the store, she'll be back soon."
Then...
1111122.title: The Blue Commit.

11111221.content: "I back." you hear someone calling from the other room followed by the sound of a door closing. "Hey Miku, we're in here" Jet shouted in response. you look and then you see a giant Milotic carrying a bag in it's mouth. "Miku, your home!" Storm shouts as he runs up and hugs the Milotic. She sets the bags on the floor and hugs him back with her tail. "I'm glad to see you too Storm" she said smiling "so how is he?" she asked looking at Shiki and Jet. "He just woke up and he seems fine." Shiki said while pointing at you. The Milotic then came up to the table you where on and was looking closely at you with her crimson red eyes. "Hi there." she said in a friendly voice "It's good to see you awake and doing good." You just sat there shaking in fear because she reminded you of snake which you where deathly afraid of. "Please don't be scared of me" she pleaded knowing exactly why your scared "I'm not like other snake Pokemon, you can trust me" she added while she used her tail fin the gently pet your head trying to calm you down. You still feel scared but, something about her makes you feel a little more at ease. "I'm Miku, whats your name?" she asked holding out her fin to you. "I...I'm Donald" you say nervously as you take her fin in your hand. "Nice to meet you Donald" she said with a kind smile. Then...
11111221.title: Miku is back.

111112211.content: "Hey, its almost dusk!" Jet exclaimed "If we go now we can get to our spot so we can watch the sunset." "Oh ya that sounds good." Shiki added "Do you want to come with us?" she asked looking at you. "Um, ok." you answer nervously. "Alright, hop on." Shiki tells you while motioning towards her back. you carefully jump off the table and land on the Vaporeon's back. "Ok let's go." Miku said while heading out the door. upon going out side you see what looks like a small sea-side town. "This is our home town Coral Bay" Shiki informed you "Most water types on Emerald Island make this their home." along the way you pass by many things like a small store ,a battle arena, and of course the large beach. "We're almost there." Jet informed you "We just need to go through..."
111112211.title: Coral Bay.

choices: You all make it back to the house.
1111122111.content: You see the Floatzel move aside a small bolder to revile what looks like a cave. As you enter you see some crystals along the top of the tunnel. As you travel deeper you notice the light growing dimmer. Finally it is dark to the point that you can't see so you cling to the Vaporeon as tightly as possible. "Don't worry Donald we know where we're going" Shiki reassures you. For a while all you can do is hang on to Shiki and listen to the sound of their foot steps on the cave floor. Then you can see a light in the distance and you are finally to see again. As you come out of the tunnel you see a small beach that is hidden by the massive cliff. "We made it." said Jet as he sat down in the sand. As Shiki sits down you slide down her back and land on the soft sand. "This is our secret spot." Shiki informers you "We come hear every night to watch the sunset." "Whys that?" you ask. "You'll see" She told you giving you a small wink. You sit down and look towards the sea waiting for the sunset. As the sun sets you see the water glow with a rainbow of colors. You watch in amazement as the colors dance around the sea surface. after five minutes the colors stop. "That was another beautiful sunset" Miku stated "But ,we should get home before it gets to dark." "Ok" Shiki said lowering her head so you can get on. Once you are back on Shiki's back they all make their way back to the house. Then..
1111122111.title: The Spot.

11111221111.content: After two minuets of walking you all make it back to the house. "You must be hungry." Miku asked "Do you want some food?" "Y..yes please" you answer nervously still a little intimidated by the Milotic. "Ok, Just wait a second" Miku said as she left the room. A minute later you see her caring a basket of fruit in her mouth. she placed the basket on the table and using her tail she picks up a large blue fruit and sets it in front you. "This is an Oran berry" Miku explains "Eating this will help you with your injuries." "Thanks" you reply "Can I have something to cut this with?" you ask. "Hear ya go" Jet says handing you what looks like a tooth pick. taking the tooth pick you start to cut the fruit and eat. It's taste reminds you of blue berry. The Oran berry is so big you only got a quarter of it ate when you can't eat any more. "Was it good" Shiki asked smiling. "Yes, thank you." you reply politely. Then everyone started to yawn "Well I guess we should get to bed." Miku responded. "Ya" Shiki agreed "We have a busy day tomorrow." "Now Donald" Miku said looking at you "we have you a bed set up in..."
11111221111.title: Back at house.

111112211112.content: "I figured that you my be more comfortable in Storm and Jet's room." Miku stated "Is that ok with you?" "Ok, I'm fine with that?" you reply sounding a little confused. "Ok then good night guys" Shiki said as she heads towards her room with Miku following behind her. "Good night you two" Jet called back "ok Donald are you ready?" He asked holding out his paw. "Yes I'm ready" you say as you climb on his paw which is as big as you. "Aww, bed time already!" Storm whined. "Yes Storm its time for bed." Jet said as he was walking to his room. as he opens the door you see two beds set up on the floor (kind of a Japanese set up) and between them was a make shift bed made with some small cloths. "Hears your bed." jet says as he puts you down next to it. you look around the room and see various items, you see a small tv with what looks like a game console attached to it and you also see various toy strung around the room. "Ok time for bed jet said as he tuned off the light. You all got in to bed and in just minuets Jet and Storm where asleep. You on the other hand was wide awake thinking about what happened. "How am I going to get home" You think to your self "and can i trust these Pokemon" You slowly start to close your eyes as you slowly fall to sleep. Then...
111112211112.title: Jet and Storm's room

1111122111122.content: You where just half way asleep when you are awaken a loud thud. "What was that." You think to your self. You sit there shaking looking around as you hear the noise several more times. You then see...
1111122111122.title: Something wakes you up.

choices: "...I don't want to talk about it."
11111221111221.content: You look over and you see storm thrashing around and making whining nosies. "He must be having a bad dream." you mumble to your self. Feeling a little concerned you get up and try to see whats wrong. "Storm, wake up!" you shout up to him being careful not to wake up jet. "What!" Storm shouted looking around frantically. He then sees you looking up at him and he picks you up lightly in his giant paw. "Oh, it you Donald." Storm said with a sigh of relief. "I heard you whining and moving around so I was wondering what was going on" you ask the large Buizel. After hearing that he lowers his head and starts water at the eyes a little. "Are you ok Storm?" you ask in concerned tone. "well..."
11111221111221.title: Storm is thrashing around.

choices: You wake up the next morning still in Storm,s arms.
You wake up the next morning feeling strange.
111112211112211.content:
(Storm)"I was just having a bad dream."
(You)"What was it about?"
(Storm)"Well, I dreamed that I was being chased and beat up by Team Venom."
(You)"Who's Team Venom?"
(Storm)"They are a group of bullies that pick on all of the smaller Pokemon, Including me."
(You)"Oh, I see."
(Storm)"Lately they have been threatening me and my friends, so I have been having nightmares about it ever since"
(You)"Well, have you told Jet?"
(Storm)"Yes however he says that there is not much he can do."
(You)"Oh."
You see Storm start to cry a little bit. You understand the Buizel's feelings and you begin to tier up as well trying to think of a way to help. "Well, this may sound strange but, is there something I can do to make you feel better?" you ask him. When Storm heard that he got a hold of his tears and replied "Well, if you don't mind can you stay close to me tonight?" You where a bit surprised at his answer but, after some thought you decided that it wouldn't hurt. "sure, if it will help you feel better."you replied. You will!" Storm said excitedly as he took you in his huge arms and gave you a big hug "Thank you so much" Even thou you where getting squished you weren't getting hurt so you didn't mind "your welcome" you call back to him with a smile on your face. Storm then started to get settled back in to his bed still holding you in his arm like a stuffed animal. "Are you comfy?" Storm asked you. "Yes I am" you reply back to him. "Ok, good night" He replied while giving a large yawn and quickly fell asleep. You felt warm and secure in his arms as you feel his soft fur with your hand. You think to your self "I don't mind this, this is very nice." as you slowly drift to sleep. Then...
111112211112211.title: Storm's nightmare.

1111122111122111.content: You wake up to see that you are still in the Buizel's arms. Storm was walking around carrying you like you where a stuffed animal. "Oh, your awake." Storm says looking at you."Did you sleep well?" "Yes I did." you say to him kindly. Storm then walks in to the room where Shiki, Jet, and Miku where waiting. "Good morning you two" Shiki said in a friendly tone "We have some berries set out for breakfast" She added while pointing at the table. Storm then set you down on the table and then everyone started eating. "Hear you go" Miku said as she placed a red berry in front of you. "Thank you" You replied as you pick up the stick from before and began eating the berry. After a while everyone finished their food. "It looks like we need to get ready for school" jet said as he picked up a bag(with a winged badge on the front) and placed the strap on his shoulder. "Yes our ride will be hear any minute. "Shiki added as she got her bag. Miku than came up to you and asked "So Donald, who do you want to go with." You think for a moment and decide...
1111122111122111.title: The next morning.

111112211112211121.content: "Well if you don't mind I'd like to go with Jet" you ask politely. "Sure thing" Jet replied as he picked you up in his paw. "Ok Let's go, the bus will be hear soon" Shiki reminded everyone while she was heading towards the door. With that everyone walks out side and after walking for a few minutes they come up to a large bus. The door opens and one by one they step on the bus and take a seat. Then Jet brought you to a small pocket on the side of his bag and placed inside it. "What are you doing?" You shout up to the Floatzel feeling a little scared. "It's ok" jet says trying to calm you down "Because of your small size I think it is best to keep you in there so you won't get lost or hurt." Hearing this put you a little more at ease plus you weren't uncomfortable and you could see just fine."Plus There has been some trouble lately so I don't want to take any chances" Jet said quietly. You are now wondering what Jet is talking about which is making you a little worried so you...
111112211112211121.title: Jet the Floatzel.

1111122111122111212.content: You feel it is best not to ask at the moment so you say nothing. soon the bus stops in front of a huge building swarming with Pokemon. "We're here" jet says calmly as he gets off the bus. As Jet walks down the halls you where amazed to see the number Pokemon of all shapes, sizes, and types as you pass by. Then Jet picks you up out of the pocket and sets you down in a large locker. "I just need to get some supplies for my next class" Jet says as he grabs various items from his locker. "If you don't mind me asking what class is that stuff for?" you ask pointing at the stuff the Floatzel was holding. "It's for my battle strategies class." Jet says as he puts his supplies in his bag. "Jet, Who are you talking to?" you hear someone calling to Jet. Jet quickly grabs you from the locker and hides you in the side pocket. Jet then turns and sees it,s...
1111122111122111212.title: The School.

11111221111221112121.content:
You peek out of the pocket and you see a large Lucario standing in front of Jet.
(Jet)"Aura, don't sneak up on me like that!"
(Lucario)"Ha ha, sorry bout that I wasn't trying to scare you."
(Jet)"Ha ha that's ok, so what's up"
(Lucario)"well I saw you and it looked like you where talking to someone."
(Jet)"Oh that, um..."
(Lucario)"are you ok Jet?"
(Jet)"I'm fine."
(Lucario)"you're acting strange Jet, is there something wrong?"
(Jet)"no there's nothing wrong."
(Lucario)"are you sure?"
(Jet)"Yes, well I need to hurry to class, see you later."
With that Jet begins to walk away trying to keep his cool. "Jet, Wait" the Lucario shouted to jet. Jet stopped and looked back as the Lucario approached. As the Lucario came closer you feared that Jet has been found out and by looking at Jet he was feeling the same way. The Lucario stopped in front of Jet and said "...
11111221111221112121.title: Aura the Lucario

111112211112211121212.content: You feel your heart skip a beat knowing you have been caught. "How did know?" Jet asked in shock. "Two reasons." The Lucario informed "One, We have the same classes so we always walk together and Two, I can see something in your bag that is giving off a strong aura." "I guess I can't hide anything from you Aura." Jet replied in a sad tone. "Please tell me what it is." The Lucario asked in a concerned tone "I'm your best friend Jet, you can tell me anything" You look up and you see Jet whisper some thing into the Lucario's ear then after a quick nod to each other they both took off down the hall. after a minute of being shaking around you hear a door shut then you see Jet's paw pick you up. You look around and you see your in...
111112211112211121212.title: Busted!

1111122111122111212121.content: You find your self in a dimly lit closet with Jet and the Lucario. "Aura, this is Donald" Jet said in a hushed tone so no one outside could hear. You sit in Jet's paw frozen in fear as the Lucario stares at you with his piercing red eyes. "Hello Donald" The Lucario says to you in a kind tone. "H..Hello A..Aura" you reply nervously. "You don't need to be afraid of me" Aura reassures you as he picks you up from Jet's paw "I won't do any thing to hurt you." You feel the Lucario pat your head gently trying to comfort you. "Where did you find him?" Aura asked Jet. "Well we saw a blue commit crash on the beach and when me and my friends went to investigate that's when we found him." Jet told Aura "That's all I really know." You look up and you see Aura pondering over something. "What are you thinking?" Jet asked. "This sounds familiar but I can't remember where I heard it from." Aura replies. "Oh, well we need to get to get class or else Mrs. Blaze will get Mad at us." Jet says jokingly. "Ha ha ok lets go." Aura said as he handed you back to Jet. With that Jet sets you back in the pocket and they both take off for class. Then....
1111122111122111212121.title: The supply closet.

11111221111221112121211.content:
You had nothing to do. You sat in the bag thinking about what happend.
Okay. I some how warped above the island. But how? How did I get here? You recalled a hole opening in the ground. Did I somehow travel through time & space? But I have made a few friends. I might get some rest it will help me.
You walk over to an eraser & lie down on it. It felt very comfy. You doze off quickly

1111122111122111212121112.content:
"Here is the first power," he continued. An orb went in your body. Donald obtained Chaos Control. Arceus teleported Up to a platform in the sky. "Come up here," he said. "How?" you asked. "Use the power I gave you," Arceus replied. You thought about the platform then said, "Chaos Control." You then warped up to the platform.

"Okay here is the second power," Arceus told you. A purple orb went in your body. Donald obtained Chaos Spear. "Take out those 3 wooden targets over there," Arceus said, "Focus your mind on them & say Chaos Spear." You focused on a target. You raised your hand. As you brung it down you said, "Chaos Spear." A yellow energy destroyed the target. "You can destroy 2 targets a once by focusing on 2 of them. But you have to raise 2 hands instead of one," Arceus explained. You thought about both of them. You raised both hands & said, "Chaos... Spear." Two lots of energy rushed the targets.

"Good, now lets battle," Arceus said.

Donald vs. Arceus

"Chaos Control," Donald said. Donald is moving at 4x speed. Donald used Chaos Spear three times. Chaos Control wore off. "Good choice," Arceus said a little tired, "Hyahh... Judgement!" A barrage of Gold arrows shot at Donald. Donald evaded twice. He got hit once. Donald was flung back. Donald Got up & used Chaos Control. Donald warped beside Arceus & kicked him 4 times. Arceus Fainted.

Donald won!!!

"Nice battle," Arceus said, "Now I will slowly grow your body slowly to 3ft in our dimension size. It is the most I can do to help save the world."

1111122111122111212121112221.content:
You look off into the distance to see Storm & a riolu getting attacked by a drapion & an ariados.
(Jet) Poor Storm. We won't make it in time to protect him from harm.
(You) I would be able to.
(Jet) No way. Just because you have a new power, doesn't mean you have to use it.
(You) Storm is my friend & your brother. Chaos Control.

You then warped in a tree not far away from Storm with time slowed. The drapion was about to use X-Scissor. "Chaos Spear," you say as you launch six bolts of energy at the drapion. Chaos Control wore off. The bolts of energy hit the drapion in the face. It then fainted. Storm, the riolu & the ariados noticed you. You then warped in front of Storm using Chaos Control. "Donald. How did you do that?" Storm asks. "A newly obtained power," you say. The ariados comes charging at you. Alright I have to confront my fear, you thought.

Donald vs. Ariados
Ariados tried to use Poison Sting. You evade & use Chaos Control. You appear above the ariados & use Chaos Spear twice. The ariados then used Shadow Sneak. You get hit & fall to the ground. You feel a little pain. You then used Chaos Spear. The Ariados then faints.

Donald Won!!!

You hold your shoulder in pain.
(Storm) Are you okay Donald?
(You) Yeah. Just a little pain. Nothing serious.

111112211112211121212111222111.content:
(Aura) Dark Day is something that happens every 50 000 years. It is rumored that a shadow pokemon called Darkrai tries to take over the world. Every time there is a blue Commit that summons a hero to fight for Arceus, the guardian of the worlds. And the hero always seems to be a small human with powers unknown to this dimension. That is all I know about Dark Day.
(You) I met Arceus in a dream I had before.
(Jet) That must mean Dark Day is coming.
(Aura) It is nearly time for the next class.
(Jet) Donald, I put an Oran berry in your pocket in the bag.
(You) Thank you.

You warp into the bag. You see the big fruit & start eating. You were felling full & took a rest.

111112211112211121212121222211.content:
“I need to tell you a story first so it all makes sense.” Mew informed the three of you. “are you ready to listen?” All three of you quietly nodded and sat down. “Alright.” Mew said getting ready to tell her story. “400 years ago there was a war with an evil race of monsters known as the night crawlers. Day after day they would come to the island and caused chaos and destruction. When all hope was lost, 9 brave hero’s came to fight those monsters. These hero’s where the hero’s of Joy, Sorrow, Rage, Peace, Courage, Wisdom, Willpower, Light, and Darkness*. These Pokemon had power that others can only dream of having. The 9 Hero’s slain the monsters as if they where nothing and returned peace to the land. Even though the monsters kept retuning the 9 Hero’s always destroyed them. Then one day a giant monster came to the island. This monster known as the destroyer was so large that it could destroy the island with one swing of his claw. The 9 Hero’s confronted the monster but, the monster was just to powerful for them to defeat. But just before all hop was lost the Hero’s combined into one and defeated the monster. Even though the monster was no more a peace of the monsters essence still remanded. The 9 Hero’s took the essence to a secret island and with all there power sealed it in a cave with an unbreakable barrier. With the world at peace again the 9 Hero’s left the island never to be heard from again. But before they left the they sent an essence from each one of the 9 Hero’s to another dimension to find a successor. The successors of these hero’s are known as Commit Children and have the amazing powers of the hero’s. Because of the time of peace we have had we never needed to call upon them…Until now.”
*The colors of each Hero to commit(Yellow, Blue, Red, Green ,Orange, Purple, Grey, White, and Black)
111112211112211121212121222211.title: The legend of the 9 Hero's.

Storm then picks you up and you holds you behind his back as he and Ryu walks over to their friends. “Hey Gingka (the Shinx), Kenta (the Growlith).” Storm shouts as they run up. “Hey Storm did you see that monster that attacked those bullies?” the Shinx shouted. “Yea we saw it.” Ryu replies with a grin on his face. “Then why are you acting so calm?” the Growlith exclaimed “There is a giant water monster roaming around!” “There’s no water monster.” Storm replies. “How could you know that?” the Shinx asked. “Because he is right here.” Ryu says as Storm takes you out from behind him. “Hello” you say as you wave to them. “Guys meet Donald, Donald meet Gingka and Kenta.” Storm says wile pointing at each of them. “Wow you have a little guy too!” Gingka the Shinx says excitedly. “What do you mean?” Storm replies a bit confused. “We found a little guy close to where I live.” Gingka explains “We saw a yellow commit crash and we found him.” “Wait your saying is that you found some one like Donald?” Ryu asks. “Yes but ours is smaller and younger then he is.” Kenta replies. “Well where is he?” you ask. “Right now he is with our older brothers.” Gingka replies. You motion Storm to bring you to his ear. “Hey this my sound odd but could you ask them to bring there brothers and the Commit to the Training grounds.” you whisper to Storm. “Sure Donald.” Storm answers wile looking back at Gingka and Kenta “Hey can you get your brothers and your little friend to come to my brother’s training grounds.” “Sure we can.” Shinx replied. “Yea knowing Kyoya and Doji they’ll defiantly come if your brother will be there.” Kenta added. “Thanks guys.” Storm says. “Oh no look it’s almost time for class.” Ryu exclaimed pointing at he clock. With out a word all of them start running, with you being shaken in Storm’s grip. They then make it to their class in the nick of time. Then…
1111122111122111212121212222111221111212.title: The Yellow Commit?

1111122111122111212121212222111221111212.content: After a few minutes Storm and Ryu’s class is over and they head out. “You ok Donald.” Storm asks. “Yea I’m fine.” you reply still having a small head ache “By the way what did Gingka and Kenta mean by if your brothers there?” “Well my brother’s team have sort of a friendly Rivalry with Kyoya and Doji‘s team.” Storm explains “They are all ways battling to see who is the best.” “Oh now I get it” you reply “Any way we should get over to the Training grounds Jet and the others are probably waiting for us.” “Right!” Storm and Ryu agree. Then…
1111122111122111212121212222111221111212.title: Skip to after class.

1111122111122111212121212222111221111212.content: You hang tight as Storm and Ryu run down the hallway. Then a strange wall of Purple energy pops up right in front of Ryu and Storm. What is that?” Ryu says. Storm walks up and try’s to push his paw though with no success. “It won’t let us though!” Storm panics. “Well look what we have here” Storm and Ryu turn around and they see two Gastlys floating in front of you. “What do you want with us?” Ryu says in fear. “Our boss sent us to take you two as prisoner.” They both say as another energy wall appears behind them “If we have you they will have no choice but to hand us the commit.” “Stay away Please!” Storm shouts with tears streaming down his face. You see Storm and Ryu’s scared faces which makes you furious. “You stay away from them!” you shout launching a large Ice Missal. The Gastlys disappear making your attack miss. “Foolish creature you can’t hurt us.” Both the Gastlys mock you as they reappear “Now all of you are coming with us.” Just as they are about to grab you…
1111122111122111212121212222111221111212.title: Team Ghoul

1111122111122111212121212222111221111212.content: Just then you notice something glowing in your pocket. You reach in and you pull out the charm you found last night and it is glowing very brightly. “*Eeeeeeeeeeek*” the Gastlys scream backing away from the light. “What’s going on?” Storm asks. “I don’t know, but what ever it is they don’t like it.” you reply holding the charm up. Then a beam of light shoots from the charm and it destroys the field of energy. “Let’s get out of here.” Ryu shouts. Storm and Ryu Run from the Gastlys wile you hang on still holding the charm trying to keep them at bay. As they keep running they soon reach…
1111122111122111212121212222111221111212.title: Glowing Charm.

1111122111122111212121212222111221111212.content: Storm and Ryu come to a screeching halt standing in front of a huge wall. “Oh no a Dead End!” Ryu shouts. “And it sounds like they might be coming this way.” Storm adds. Just then the charm turns into a small light and it vanishes into your chest. “This can’t be good.” you say. Storm and Ryu back up against the wall afraid for there lives. Then something grabs Storm and Ryu from behind and it pulls them through the wall. Before they could yell it covered their mouths. The room your where in was dark and you could only see a dim out line. “*Shhh* calm down or they will hear you.” the shadowy figure says “Just relax and you will be safe. Now wait here.” You watch as you see the figure walk strait though a solid wall. “Hey have you seen two Pokemon run though here.” You hear the two Gastlys from before say. “Sorry but I didn’t see any one around here.” the mystery figure says “I think they might have took off in the other direction.” You listen and you hear the two Gastlys float away. Just then the shadow comes back. “Their gone.” the figure says. “Who are you.” all of you say at the same time. The shadow reaches up and pulls a cord turning on the light and you see…
1111122111122111212121212222111221111212.title: A friend beyond the wall.

choices: You make it to the training grounds.
1111122111122111212121212222111221111212.content: You, Storm, and Ryu stair blankly at the Sableye not sure what to think. He looked like a normal Sableye except for the stone on it’s chest was blue instead of red. “Who are you?” Storm asks feeling slightly afraid. “My name is Dimitri” the Sableye replies “Please don’t be afraid of me, I mean you no harm.” “What just happened.” you ask. “Those two Gastly are members of a group called team ghoul.” Dimitri explains “They have received orders from there boss, Gengar to take you as hostage in order to get there claws on the Blue Commit. I just couldn’t let them take you so I phased you though the wall.” “Hold on how do you possibly know this?” you ask feeling a bit suspicious. “Oh I over heard them talking about there plans in the woods out side.” The Sableye says scratching his head. “Well thanks for your help Mr. Dimitri.” Storm replies “But we need to get going back to the training grounds.” “Well allow me to escort you outside.” Dimitri says as he places his claws on Storm and Ryu’s shoulders and walks them towards a wall “Just relax and step forward.” All four of you go though the wall and you all stand outside of the school. “That was cool.” Ryu says “Hey you should come with us.” “Yea you should come and meet our friends” Storm added. “Oh I would like to but I need to.. Whoa” Dimitri was cut off as Ryu grabs his claw and starts pulling him along behind him. You look at Dimitri with a concerned look on your face. “He seems to be telling us the truth.” you think to your self “But how dose he know so much?” Then…
1111122111122111212121212222111221111212.title: Dimitri the Sableye.

choices: Tell Dimitri to leave and never return.
Hear Dimitri out and get answers.
1111122111122111212121212222111221111212.content: As You, Storm, Ryu, and Dimitri go though the forest you notice a strange tension in the air. “Everyone duck!” you shout. As everyone ducked down you see throwing stars made of pure energy fly over you. “What was that!” Storm shouted. Then something swoops in and grabs you, Storm, and Ryu and sets you to the side. You look up and you see it’s Aura. “Big Brother what are you doing?” Ryu asked. “Saving you guys from him.” Aura says pointing at Dimitri. You look and you see Jet confronting Dimitri. “So you thought you could hold them hostage, well guess again.” Jet said in a angry voice. Jet then grabs Dimitri in a ball of water and he then freezes him to a tree. “Jet, hold on!” you shout “Why are you attacking him?” “Because he works for Team Ghoul.” Jet replies “He was one of the one’s sent to capture Storm and Ryu as hostages as a way of getting you.” “But you must have seen a different Sableye.” you try to reasoned with Jet “Dimitri helped use escape from Team Ghoul.” “No this is the Sableye I saw.” Jet replied “I can never forget that blue gem on his chest.” You look at Dimitri in shock as you see his expression. “Is this true.” you ask “Are you a member of Team Ghoul.” “*Sigh* Yes I am a member.” Dimitri said plainly. You look at Dimitri with disbelief. “However I’m not a bad Pokemon you have to believe that.” Dimitri says to you. “Why should we believe you!” Jet shouts. You then…
1111122111122111212121212222111221111212.title: The Shocking Truth.

choices: You would really let me join?
I must do this on my own.
1111122111122111212121212222111221111212.content: “Jet wait.” you said demandingly “Let’s hear him out.” Jet looked at you with a confused look on his face but he soon nods and stands down. “Dimitri please answer me honestly.” you say looking up at him “Why did you save Storm and Ryu. You know that you would be severely punished if someone was to catch you So why did you do it?” Dimitri looked down with a sad look on his face. “Because that’s what Millenia would have wanted me to do.” Dimitri replies in a sad tone. “Who is this Millenia?” you ask “Is she a friend of your’s” “Actually she was my only friend.” Dimitri replied “You see 4 years ago when I first came to this school I was an outcast. Everyone stayed away from me because everyone believed I was trouble cause that’s what all Sableyes are in there eyes. I was very alone until that day I met her. One day wile walking to class someone said hello to me. I turned around and I saw a young Swoobat. I didn‘t know what to do since no one had ever spoken to me before so I was very insecure. However she under stood me and she helped me feel wanted. Even though no one else liked me I didn’t care if Millenia was with me. We have been real close ever since.” “Well then what happened that made you join Team Ghoul?” You ask. Dimitri sighs heavily as he continues “About a month ago me and Millenia where walking together when we saw the leader of Team Ghoul, Gengar tormenting a young Pokemon. Millenia couldn’t stand seeing a little Pokemon being bullied so she went after him. Even though she was at a disadvantage she beat him and he ran off humiliated. Then that night wile she was flying home, Team Ghoul ambushed her they beat her up. She was almost done for but the island police arrived and Team Ghoul fled. They took her to the Pokemon Center to try and help heal her. When I got the news I got over there as fast as I could. When I saw her she had many burses on her body and both her wings where broken. Even though she was in a lot of pain she smiled at me when she saw me. I was told that it would be weeks before she would be able to fly again and after hearing that I was determined to help Millenia feel better. So day after day I visited her and hoping to see the day that she would be able to fly again. But one day I came to visit her and I saw that the Center had been raided by a gang of Pokemons. I feared the worse had happened so I rushed to see if Millenia was alright, however when I got to her room there was no sign of her anywhere. I looked everywhere for her but I could never find her and I expected that Team Ghoul had some thing to do with it. However I couldn’t seem to get any info on them from the outside so I did the only thing I could do to get what I wanted, I joined Team Ghoul.” “So you joined Team Ghoul so you could find out what happened to your friend.” Jet says with sympathy “Did you find out?” “Sadly no.” Dimitri says sadly “However I can’t shake the feeling that she is still alive so I kept looking. However I also remembered Millenia would always want to help others in need so I would always try to help little Pokemon that Team Ghoul harmed.” You could see the sadness in his face. You could see that if he could cry he would but being a Sableye he couldn’t. Jet released his ice grip on Dimitri as he looks at him with sympathy. “I’m sorry.” Jet says. “Don’t be you where just looking after your friend.” Dimitri says getting to his feet. “Hey why don’t you join us.” you ask “That way we could help you find your friend.” Dimitri looks at you and he replies.
1111122111122111212121212222111221111212.title: The Sableye's sad tale.

choices: Jet and Aura’s Rivals have arrived.
1111122111122111212121212222111221111212.content: “Thank you for your kind offer.” Dimitri said calmly “But I must say no. If I where to join you now I would only be putting you all in danger.” “We understand.” you reply “If you join us your position in team Ghoul would be compromised. And I understand why you must keep it.” Jet look’s at you feeling a little lost but he remains silent. “Well even so you got our support if you need it.” You reply with a smile “I hope you find your friend soon.” Dimitri looks at you in shock but he soon leaps up into the trees. “Thank you.” Dimitri says as he leaves the forest in hast. “Well I think we spent enough time here.” you say as you walk towards Jet “Let’s get to the training grounds, the others are probably waiting for us.” “Sounds good.” Jet says finally finding his voice. With that you, Jet, Aura, Ryu, and Storm make your way back to the training grounds where you see…
1111122111122111212121212222111221111212.title: I must stand alone.

You notice that all of Jet’s team is looking at them intensely ready to strike at any moment. “I guess when Storm told me this was a friendly rivalry, he was using it the term lightly.” you think to your self as you cling to Jet’s neck feeling a bit uneasy. “Well my little brother asked me and Doji to come here.” the Luxray replies calmly “I’m not sure why, but he said there was something I would like to see.” “Oh yeah that’s right.’ you say “I had Storm ask if they could come here cause they have the Yellow Commit.” “And your telling me this now.” Jet says as he look’s over at you feeling a bit left out. “Who’s your little friend there Jet?” the Arcanine asks pointing at you. “Is that the Blue Commit?” the Luxray adds. “*Sigh* yes.” Jet replies “Kyoya (Luxray), Doji (Arcanine) meet Donald.” They look at you for a moment and they then look at Jet. “So I guess you found a Commit child too.” Kyoya says smiling “I found one as well.” “Really?” Aura asked in shock. “Yep, have a look.” Kyoya says as he turns to show his back. You see…

112.title: Lance

1121.content: You were just a regular guy with some great friends. You often wish that you could go on a life-changing adventure that would change you from "that kid who never speaks" to somebody who makes a difference. Unknown to you, your wish would soon be granted. One day, you took a walk around town, when, out of nowhere, a portal opened in front of you. " This can't be happening," you say to yourself. The portal begins to suck you in and you find yourself flying through a tunnel of strange colors. You then see yourself falling to the ground from about 43 feet. "AAAAHHHHH!" you yell as you get closer to the ground. When you finally hit the ground, you black out, like it was a dream. You wake up in a small house, apparently on a large coffee table. "What the hell happened to me!?" you say out loud. "Where am I?" It was then that you realized three things: One is that this isn't your room. Two is that you feel pain in your stomach. And three is that everything is way bigger than it normally should be. You try to scratch your head when you realize that it's covered with some cloth as well as some serious bruises and burns. "That dream must have been real after all," you say. You estimate yourself to be 3 inches tall at the least based on your surroundings. You hear voices coming from another room,one male and one female, but your unsure if you should look. So, you decide to.....
1121.title: A Wild Ride

choices: You make it just in time
11211.content:
"I wonder who else is here," you say to yourself. You carefully climb down the leg of the table and proceed towards the source of the voices.
"I just found him outside, completely beaten up," a feminine voice said.
"Who did it?" asked a more boyish voice.
"I don't know, but we can't just leave him. He'll just get beat up again."
"Well, you'll have to talk to him when he wakes up."
You quickly realize that they're about to come to looking for you, so you turn to run back to the table and...
11211.title: Strange new world

112111.content:
You turn to run back to the table, but end up running into something. "What the-," was all you could say before you were being lifted up into the air by the back of your shirt.
"Hey, big bro, what's this?" asked your captor. You then see a humongous Servine and Kirlia come into the room. "Syron, put him down!" yelled the Servine, which was male as you heard his voice. You can feel yourself being lowered to the ground and when your feet touch the ground and your shirt being released, you just stare up at the 3 huge Pokemon. "Hi there," the Kirlia said. You give a faint wave of your hand and this causes the Kirlia to laugh a bit. "What's wrong? Skitty got your tongue?" she asked. You give off a small chuckle and then the Servine spoke to you. "You okay?" he asked. "Y-yeah," you say finally getting over the shock. "Hey, can I ask you something?" "Sure," the Servine said. You then ask him...
112111.title: Surprise!

1121111.content: "Oh, this is our house on Emerald Island," he explained. Your jaw drops with shock as you here the words "Emerald Island".After a minute or two, you get over the fact that you've been magically transported away from your home and speak again. "Okay, now, who are you?" you asked. "I'm Sira," the Kirlia answered. "I'm Lakon," the Servine added. "And that's my little bro, Syron." The little Snivy looked at you and apologized for earlier. "It's ok," you tell him. You then here the sound of a vehicle outside, which causes everyone to rush out the front door with their out backpack. "W-what's going on!?" you ask Lakon. "The school bus is here!" he answered. You are then lifted up and placed in Lakon's bag as he rushes out the door and gets on the bus.
1121111.title: A long way from home

11211111.content: After recovering from your rough ride, you climb to the top of the bag and talk to Lakon. "What was that for!?" you asked in a quiet voice. "Sorry, but I couldn't leave you alone at our house, so I just put you in my bag so I could bring you along," Lakon explained. "Okay," you say. "Thanks for explaining." "No problem," he said with a smile. You smile back as you enjoy the rest of the ride. Once the bus stops, Lakon and you get off the bus and enter a busy school hallway filled with many Pokemon. Lakon entered a small classroom and took his seat at the back of the room. "Where's everyone else?" you ask. "They should be here shortly," Lakon said. "And you know, you sure ask a lot of questions." "Sorry," you say while hanging your head down in shame in the bag. "Don't sweat it," he said. You hear a bell ring and the room was suddenly filled with tons of Pokemon.
11211111.title: Explanations

choices: An Arbok who doesn't look happy
112111112.content: As you slept through most of Lakon's classes, he finally woke you up at lunch. "Good," you tell him. "I haven't eaten anything for a while now." You exit the bag and find you and Lakon sitting underneath a tree, far enough away from anyone else that you could sit without anyone noticing. "Here," said Lakon handing you an Oran Berry. You happily take the berry and start wolfing it down. "Gee, you must love to eat," he said. "you bet!" you tell him taking another huge bite of the berry, covering yourself in juice and causing Lakon to laugh a bit. You see Lakon's lunch and see that it is a nice sandwich and some juice. "Hey!" someone called out. You and Lakon turn around and see...
112111112.title: The Vital Moment

1121111122.content: "You, the Servine, I know that you have one of the Commit children, so hand it over!" the Arbok demanded. "I have no idea what you're talking about," Lakon told him. "Fine then, you just made a big mistake," the Arbok said before tackling Lakon. You just watched as Lakon tried to fight against the Arbok, But as you know, Lakon is a grass type and Arbok is a poison type, so Lakon was at a disadvantage. "What should I do!?" you thought to yourself.
1121111122.title: A bad matchup

11211111221.content: "Lakon helped me, so now it's my time to help him!" you said before running at the two battling Pokemon. "So, you decided to show yourself,"the Arbok said before knocking Lakon away. "You leave Lakon and me along!" you told him while trying not to seem too afraid. "Sorry, but you're coming with me," he said before coming at you. You closed your eyes as you started running at him and then you just threw a punch ahead of you before you felt it come in contact with the Arbok. Then, you opened your eyes and saw an unconscious Arbok on the ground and your entire body was giving off an eerie black aura. "What's happening to me?" you said. You suddenly felt weak and fell on your hands and knees. You saw Lakon running towards you before you passed out. When you woke up, you were...
11211111221.title: Unknown powers are good

choices: "there's an empty classroom where we can talk."
112111112212.content:
You opened your eyes and saw a worried Lakon and Sira looking down at you.
(you) What happened to me? Where am I?
(Lakon) You passed out after helping me, so when Sira came running over to me, her and I took you to a supply closet to check on you.
(you) Well, ok.
(Lakon) No, it's not. It's all my fault you that it happened.
(you) It's not your fault. You didn't know about that Arbok and neither did I.
(Sira) He's right. I don't think that anyone knew about that Arbok.
(Lakon) Alright, lets go.
(you) Go where?
112111112212.title: Repaying a friend

1121111122122.content:
You three go into a seemingly deserted classroom to talk about what happened when you hear someone.
(you) Whose there?
(???) Relax, brave hero. I mean you no harm.
(you) Show yourself!
Then, from behind the abandoned teacher's desk, appeared none other than the legendary Pokemon, Mew! As Mew just floated, Lakon and Sira got down on one knee and bowed before the legendary Pokemon while ou just stood there.
(Lakon) Hey! Show some respect!
(Sira) Relax Lakon. He doesn't know any better.
(you) I have a name, you know! It's Lance.
(Mew) Lance, you, along with 8 others of your kind, are destined to save our world as the Commit children of the 9 Heroes.
(you) Wait, who are the 9 Heroes exactly?
(Mew) Oh, well, I guess I need to tell you a story first so it all makes sense. Are you ready to listen?
All three of you quietly nodded and sat down.
(Mew) Alright. 400 years ago there was a war with an evil race of monsters known as the Night Crawlers. Day after day, they would come to the island and caused chaos and destruction. When all hope was lost, 9 brave heroes came to fight those monsters. These heroes where the heroes of Joy, Sorrow, Rage, Peace, Courage, Wisdom, Willpower, Light, and Darkness. These Pokemon had power that others can only dream of having. The 9 Heroes slain the monsters as if they where nothing and returned peace to the land. Even though the monsters kept retuning the 9 Heroes always destroyed them. Then, one day, a giant monster came to the island. This monster, known as the Destroyer, was so large that it could destroy the island with one swing of his claw. The 9 Heroes confronted the monster but the monster was just to powerful for them to defeat. But just before all hope was lost, the Heroes combined into one and defeated the monster. Even though the monster was no more, a peace of the monsters essence still remanded. The 9 Heroes took the essence to a secret island and, with all there power, sealed it in a cave with an unbreakable barrier. With the world at peace again, the 9 Heroes left the island never to be heard from again. But before they left the they sent an essence from each one of the 9 Heroes to another dimension to find a successor. The successors of these heroes are known as Commit Children and have the amazing powers of the heroes. Because of the time of peace we have had we never needed to call upon them…Until now.
1121111122122.title: The 9 Heroes

11211111221221.content:
(you) So, there are 8 other humans in this world that have been called here for the same reason I was?
(Mew) Yes, that is correct.
(you) And we all have to reseal the barrier that is holding that demon back?
(Mew) Yes
(you) But, which one am I?
(Mew) You are the chosen one to become the Hero of Darkness.
(you) Well, might as well get going.
(Mew) Hold on. First, you must find all the other Commit children. Then you will be able to seal the barrier once again.
(you) Do you have any idea where the others are?
Mew shook her head sadly.
(you) I had a feeling you'd say that.
Mew disappeared in a puff of smoke and you just stared at Lakon and Sira.
(you) Well, we're not going to find the others just standing around!
(Sira) Okay, there's no way you can be the Hero of Darkness!
(you) And what does that mean?
(Sira) Look at you! You're just too small and adorable to be the Hero of Darkness.
You felt like you'd just had your last nerve snap. No matter who it was, you didn't like anyone making fun of you.
You felt your blood begin to boil and your anger beginning to consume you...
11211111221221.title: The search begins

choices: skip to the good stuff already!
112111112212211.content:
(Lakon) Hey, are you alright there Lance?
You immediately calm down as you don't want to draw any unnecessary attention.
(you) Yeah, I'm fine.
(Lakon) Well, it looked like you were going to blow your top.
(you) It's just my new powers. I'm still getting used to the feeling.
(Lakon) Then what's that in your hand?
You look at your hand and notice a pitch black sword was in it.
(you) Hm. This could be useful.
(Sira) You're not shocked that a sword just magically appeared in your hand!?
(you) No, not a bit. These kind of things always happen to heroes.
(Sira) And how do you know that?
(you) Look, right now, we should be looking for the other Commit children and not waste our time arguing.
(Lakon) He's right. But where should we start looking?
(you)(deviously) I have a theory.

1122211.title: Garchomp

1122212.content:
With your headache fading, you take a moment to assess your situation. Looking around, you realize almost immediately that you are in a nest of some sort; sticks and leaves abound. You also immediately see that this nest was laid in a thorn bush. Very painful-looking thorns and branches surround you, almost daring you to try and traverse them. You had lived in a place absolutely riddled with these bushes, though, and had you been your normal size, you probably could've done so with nary a scratch on you. That actually reminded you: you had been shrunk! Comparing the apparent size of this bush with those back at home, you surmised that you were about a foot tall, meaning that everything was almost six times larger. But this didn't make sense; even at 6x size, an ordinary bird wouldn't have been able to make a nest this large.
What could've created this?.....
Your thoughts are answered when you hear a loud flapping noise from behind. Whipping around, you are stunned by what you see.
The bird's skin was steel-gray everywhere except the red feathers on its wings, the piercing yellow eyes, and the navy-blue neck, talons, and tail. The triangular crest on its head and the sharp teeth in its jaw confirmed your analysis: This was a Skarmory.
A 30-foot-tall Skarmory. Well, this just made your day.
The steel bird perches on the branches in front of you, the thorns not seeming to hurt it in the slightest. The two of you stare at each other for what feels like an eternity. Your friendliness back at home had granted you the ability to read faces like a pro, so you took this precious moment to judge this avian's feelings.
Child-like curiosity and wonder, riddled with shyness and timidity, were what you had seen at first. Looking deeper into those golden eyes, you could've sworn you could see some fear as well. Odd... why would this massive steel predator hold any fear at all with someone of your diminutive stature?
Finally, you decide to be bold and break the silence. "Umm.... Hello."
The Skarmory had tensed up at your words, but relaxed when it understood your intent. "H-Hello," it responded back. The voice sounded feminine, and a few years younger than you as well. Was it really just a child?
"A-Are you hurt at all? I tried to put you down without scratching you," she continued with a worried tone.
So she had rescued you from.... wherever you had landed in this strange world. You were grateful that someone would do such a thing. "Yes, I am alright," you replied. "How did you find me?"
"I was flying when I noticed a weird-looking portal near one of the hills. Suddenly, a small creature popped out! You were unconscious when I got to you, so I decided to take you back to my nest," she explained. Almost immediately afterwards, she gave you that same timid look and added, "Umm.. W-what are you, exactly?"
"I am something called a human," you responded.
"Hoo...Hu-man,"' she repeated. "I've never seen something like you before. Maybe it's just because I only left my parents' nest a couple weeks ago." Suddenly, she looks very sad as she adds, "Or... maybe I really am as clueless as my brothers told me."
"Don't say that," you say, standing up and walking towards her. She starts shrinking back as you approach, and it might have been funny were it not for the current situation. "Obviously, you aren't clueless if you noticed me on that hill and brought me here. Your brothers are clueless for not realizing how kind their sister is, so don't you go thinking that they're right!" You were almost shouting now, and the Skarmory had pinned herself to the side of the nest, curled up and shaking with fear.
Perhaps you had taken that a bit too far; your temper got ahold of you sometimes. Lowering your voice a little and kneeling down, you continue, "Please, there's no reason to be afraid of me. I don't bite, I promise." This was ridiculous. She should be saying that to YOU, not the other way around. You were going to have to really talk with her later to figure out the deal with her self esteem and fear of everything.
Slowly, she uncurled herself and looked at you with those yellow eyes, the fear beginning to fade. You took the chance immediately, saying, "I don't think I've mentioned my name. It's Shane. What's yours?"
"S-Sarah," she replied. Although most of the fear was gone, she still retained that timid and shy persona.
"It's a pleasure to meet you, Sarah," I said with a reassuring smile. This was going to be interesting.
1122212.title: A Bird of Steel

(Rai) "anyway I fell and I just cried and cried, thinking of all the effort I put in for nothing and how I felt betrayed by everyone. Then a few of my friends ran over to check on me. I didn't know what to say, so i remained quiet and in a silent tone thanked them for being there for me. All of us decided to head here to my cave and discuss our situation. I had started breathing heavy and turned around only to see my best friend right behind me. That's when i was sure that i actually had friends and not just fakes. We both went to his place since it was closer. When we got there, I saw an egg and asked him about it. All he told me was that he had a baby brother coming. I told him now he had another ally on our side and he chuckled. Then the next day at school was bad and not like that rainy day, more hatred than betrayal. The bullies started talking trash how no matter what size I was, I was always weak and started hitting me. It didn't too bad, but it was really irritating. Then I looked over and finally lost all control. For what I saw were all my friends, both big and small taking hits from those jerks. I picked up one of my bullies and threw him at another, then gave the leader a nice full force punch square in his wretched face. The rest were easily taken care of with an unstoppable hyper beam. Luckily, all my friends went unscathed and the enemies had been taken care of, but that's when things got worse. Someone had tapped me on the shoulder and I turned around to see my principal glaring at me. I went with him to the office and got a lecture on how bullying is such a bad thing to do. I tried to defend my position and told him to call my friends in, but he said there would be none of that and told me lying is just as bad as bullying the littler guys. He then signed a sheet issuing three days out of school suspension. I stormed out of his office and went straight home. My friends tried to slow me down and talk to me, but I was so enraged that ignoring them was the best option. Three days at home got lonely quick and even though my friends stopped by everyday after school to try and talk to me, I just felt lonely and betrayed by the world again. That's really when I became antisocial. I still talk to my friends a little, not as much as i used to and all those bullies left us all alone after that, but now nobody talks to me out of fear and when they do, I don't know what to say to them. That is the tale of Rai's anti-socialism." You looked at him and told him "well my story is almost exactly identical just without evolution or cool attacks and a few other things." (Rai) "well any other questions for me?"...
1122221211211.title: Disagree  (sometimes things become too great to...

choices: You wake up in the middle of the night
11222212112111.content:
(you) “Yeah, I have a few more questions.”
(Rai) “Then fire away. Just don’t get too personal.”
(you) “Alright, um… where are we?”
(Rai) “Well let me show you and tell you.”
He sticks his hand out to you and you step on. Rai then sets you on his shoulder and steps out of his cave. You look out at the setting sun and realize how long the two of you have been talking.
(Rai) “This is Emerald Island, home to many kinds of pokemon. Where I live is part of Iron Head Isle.”
You look at the mountain and notice the only water around are the rivers rolling down the mountainside.
(you) “Wait, why do they call this area an isle if it’s on the mountainside?”
(Rai) “I don’t really know. Nobody does. Maybe its just because the water seems to separate us from everyone else. Do you see that building in the middle of the town?”
You nod.
(Rai) “Well that’s where every pokemon goes to school.”
Your jaw drops and you almost fall back, but recover when you realize that falling back wouldn’t end well.
(Rai) “Hey, is something wrong?”
(you) “Well it’s just that I’ll be going to school still, now with pokemon only, not that there’s anything wrong with that but there are no my-sized humans to mix with, and I went to school with kids from a small town, not an entire island.”
(Rai) “Well I can see why going to a completely new school with a completely new group would kinda suck, but you said yourself you didn’t talk to ‘your-sized humans’ anyway, plus you’re small enough you can hide and not be noticed. Besides, who said you’re coming with me anyway?”
When he says this, he shoots you a puzzling glance. You drop back a little and say “well I just assumed I was going to go with you, but I guess that… You’re cut off by Rai and he says “well I was going to bring you regardless. Leaving you alone in an all-huge, pokemon world just seemed dangerous. I just thought I would screw with you a bit.”
(you) (phew) Thank goodness, I’d hate to try and overpower.”
Hearing this, Rai gives a chuckle.
(you) “Well I only got a few more questions, so umm… where am I going to sleep?”
(Rai) “Well I’m not really sure. You should be close to me for safety, but far away enough for our own space. Maybe I could make a bed for you on that table by my bed. How about you go and check?”
You nod and he sets you on the ground, letting you roam towards his room. You ran the whole way and climbed to the top, using various notches as your footholds. You look out across the table and you could guarantee a mini bed would fit up here. But before you climb down, you hear Rai talking to what sounds like a young male pokemon.
(???) “Hi Rai. How are you?”
(Rai) “I’m alright. How about you?”
You climb down and hide along the wall while they are talking.
(???) “I’m great. My brother wants to know if you want to come over for dinner.”
There is a pause and you peek out around the corner of the wall to see Rai has his head dropped slightly and he appears to be talking to a riolu.
(Rai) “Not tonight. Sorry, it’s just that I’ve got a lot on my mind.”
The riolu then looks sad and says “oh, well my brother really wants you over sometime for dinner and you always seem busy…”
(Rai) I really am sorry, but I just seem to have something going all the time.”
(Riolu) “Well maybe next time or maybe next time, we can come eat with you.”
(Rai) (smiling) “That sounds like a great idea. See you around”
(Riolu) “Bye Rai.”
And with that, the riolu was off. Rai walks back to the table and sets his head down, sighing. You jog over to the table and climb up the leg… again. You go over to Rai and tap on his head. He just looks up at you.
(you) “Who was that?”
(Rai) “That was Ryu, Aura’s little brother.”
(you) “And… who is Aura?”
(Rai) “Oh that’s right, I never told you. You remember when I was telling you my story and mentioned my best friend?”
You nod.
(Rai) “Well Aura is a lucario and was and still is my best friend. He’s one of the only people I try to talk to.”
(you) “So why do you seem depressed, he proves someone treats you like an equal.”
(Rai) “That’s true, but almost every night, either he or Ryu comes down and asks if I would join them for dinner, but I always indirectly say no. I feel like such a jerk, but I feel like I would just ruin things or create an awkward silence.”
(you) “Oh... and I think I have only one more question.”
(Rai) “Yeah what is it?”
Before you can say anything, your stomach growls, causing Rai to crack up.
(Rai) “Well assuming that was your question, I’d say now would be the perfect time to eat.”
(you) “Great, so I don’t mean to sound picky, but what’s on the menu?”
Rai shoots a grin your direction and heads over to his fridge. He pops it open and grabs a handful of berries as well as a bottle of tea. You look at all he grabbed as he sets everything on the table, and while drooling, run over to the stockpile. Rai pops the bottle open and pours the cap full of tea, puts it in front of you and completes your meal by rolling an oran berry your way. Without much thought you say thanks and dig in. The both of you eat, Rai eating every other berry except yours and chugging the tea. You, however, had finished your cap of tea and was halfway through the berry when you stopped.
(Rai) “You finished?”
(you) “Yep.” Rai reaches over and eats what’s left of your berry. You look out the cave and notice the moonlight.
(Rai) (standing and stretching) “Well it’s about time to go to sleep wouldn’t you say?”
(You) “Well, with school tomorrow I guess so.”
(Rai) (Giving you a hand to climb on) “Well let’s go. I’ll set your bed up.”
With that, you climb up and head towards his room. He turns all the lights off along the way and walks into his room. He sets you on the little table, grabs some cloth, and organizes the cloth into a makeshift bed.
(Rai) “Well there you go and can I ask you a question?”
(you) “Well with all the questions I asked, I don’t see why not.”
(Rai) “Well I want to call you something, but saying James doesn’t sound cool saying it
over and over again, so I had come up with a nickname and wanted to know if it would be okay if I called you by it.”
(you) “As long as it ain’t late for dinner, I think I’ll be fine with it.”
You look at Rai laughing and nodding his head.
(Rai) “No. I was thinking something more like Jay or Jai or something like that.”
(you) Well I like that idea of being called Jai, ‘Jai and Rai’ or ‘Rai and Jai’, just if you would every now and then call me James please.”
Rai lays in his bed and shuts off the light on the table.
(Rai) “Can do. Well night Jai.”
(you) “Night Rai.”
And you fall asleep, thinking of all that’s happened today and how you met someone just like you. In your thoughts, you say to yourself “Wow, somebody just like me and we act like we’ve known each other for a while. I hope I didn’t rub off on him in a bad way. I hope all the people at his school are as nice as he is. Maybe we can each help each other be more social. Well tomorrow is another day at a new school with pokemon. Hope for the best, expect the worst. I hope my family isn’t too worried about me or anybody else. I’d hate to start a search party for me, because if I don’t know where I am, they sure won’t find me. Well at least I know Rai will be with me, like an older brother.” In the final moments before you sleep, you whisper to Rai thanks and drift off to sleep. Then...
11222212112111.title: Yes

112222121121112.content:
It was the next morning, but you were still asleep. You had a dream about your family and were on a completely different dream. You were in an area of complete shadow and in the far distance was a white light. Unsure of what it was, you walk towards it. But as you approached it, it too approached you, just at a quicker speed. It wasn’t until it was probably thirty feet away that it made a sound. The sound struck fear in. It wasn’t until it was probably thirty feet away that it made a sound. The sound struck fear in you as you realized what was heading your way; a freight train. Yet, when you knew it was too late and you would have been hit, if you wouldn’t have woken up. You quickly arose in a cold sweat, breathing heavily. You look over at Rai’s bed and notice he isn’t there. “I hope he didn’t leave without me” you say to yourself. Rai then walks in and looks your direction.
(Rai) “Good morning James. Hey, you okay? You don’t look so good”
(you) “Morning Rai. I’m alright, just had a bad wake up call.”
(Rai) “Bad wake up call? What do you mean?”
You then explain to Rai your dream, about the eternal darkness and that little light.
(Rai) “Well I don’t know about the darkness or the light, but I gotta apologize for that sound.”
(you) “Why?”
(Rai) “Well every morning I go down to the river for my wake up and while I’m down there, I let loose my mighty cry and come back to my cave. That sound you heard was probably me. Sorry.”
(you) “It’s alright. I broke your usual routine and I that’s not your fault. Anyways I’m up and moving. I don’t mean to be a bother but do you think you could go to the river again, this time with me, please?”
He walks closer to table and reaches out his hand.
(Rai) “It’s not a bother. I like being by the water, anyways.”
(you) (puzzled) “But wait, you’re a stee… never mind.”
You step up and Rai walks toward the exit, but after he gets out, his pace becomes slower and almost cautious.
(you) “What’s the matter Rai?”
(Rai) (whispering)“ Well, I don’t think showing you off or letting anyone see is a good idea and I don’t know where anybody is, so…”
(you) “Oh, that’s a good point. Glad you think of this stuff because I don’t think I would”
You look at him as he grins and chuckles quietly. He finally stops at the river, kneels and stretches out his hand to let you off, and lays on the ground. You walk up to the river and notice the slow-flowing, crystal clear water and you turn around to face Rai.
(you) “This is amazing. The river is slow enough I can get in and not have to worry about being carried away, for the most part at least. Thanks for bringing me”
(Rai) “No problem, besides I feel like I owe you something for that rude awakening.”
(you) “Well, I should still say thanks and is the only reason you brought me because you woke me up?”
(Rai) (chuckling) “No, just thought this might make us a little more even.”
(you) “Well I don’t care who’s up or down, at least I know now. Why aren’t you in a rush to get to school, aren’t I slowing you down?”
(Rai) “Actually I get up early every morning just in case something happens.”
(you) “Well that’s a great plan. So will you get up even earlier tomorrow morning because of me?”
(Rai) “Probably and quit acting like you’re a problem. You are somebody I can talk to without feeling too… different. So thanks.
(you) “Thanks back since you are taking care of me. Are we even?”
(Rai) “Only with your consent.”
(you) “Deal we’re even.”
Both of you smile until Rai breaks the silence.
(Rai) “You hear something?”
You nod and in a flash a large black and blue pokemon runs past at a distance.
(???) “Morning Rai, wish I could talk, but I wanna keep going so I’m early. (turning back) Come on Ryu.”
(Ryu) (getting closer) “Coming Aura. Morning Rai”
(Rai) (sitting up) “Morning you two and see you both at school”
(Ryu and Aura) “See you later.”
And with that, they were gone, leaving Rai with a fearful expression.
(you) “What’s the matter Rai?”
(Rai) “I’m just hoping Aura didn’t see you.”
(you) “I don’t mean to go against you, but my clothes blend in with the mountain and I’m not exactly big enough to see at a distance.”
(Rai) “I know you don’t mean to be rude and I don’t either, but did you take into account his ability to read auras?”
You then freeze up and wonder yourself. The two of you do nothing but breathe, until you break the silence.
(you) “Well I guess we’ll just hope for the best.”
Rai nods and you turn around, kneel, and splash the refreshing water on your face. You shake it off and walk up to Rai, who looks lost in thought.
(you) “Hey, it’ll be alright.”
(Rai) “Yeah, you’re probably right, I guess when we get to school I’m just going to have to avoid Aura.
Rai shakes his head and you climb up him to his shoulder and pat his head.
(you) “If we want any chance for me to be safe, we’re just going to have to play it safe and stay positive, otherwise we can’t possibly succeed. Besides, if you want to talk to Aura, I can always hide out at your house until you get back.”
(Rai) “Really? You would stay back and do nothing just so I can talk to a few friends?”
(you) “I came crashing down, literally, into your life and I’d hate to ruin it.”
(Rai) “Thanks. Well I’d like to get to school early, so can we please get going?”
(you) Yeah, of course. You still have authority here, so you make the choices.”
Rai stands up, making sure you don’t fall off and begins walking back towards his cave.
(Rai) “Let’s fix your last statement: We make the choices, because you may notice or know something I don’t and vice versa.”
You nod, but remain silent as he walks into the cave. Rai sets you on the kitchen table as he walks towards the back of his cave.
(you) “So I know I’m going to school with you, but where I’m going to hide?”
(Rai) “Well I’m not exactly the best hider, but I thought maybe you could hid in my school bag.”
(you) “As long as it’s a safe place to hide, I’m not gonna complain.”
(Rai) (walking back with a messenger bag slung on his shoulder) “Well this thing holds all my stuff and it seems pretty spacey. It’s the only bag that works well with me, plus it’s comfortable.”
(you) “I want a bag like that in my size, no lie.”
(Rai) “Well thanks for the praise, but it ain’t that cool.”
(you) “(raising a hand and pointer finger high in the air) FALSE. Well it’s cool, end of discussion. Shouldn’t we be heading to school?”
(Rai) “Yeah, hop in and try to get comfy, (opening the flap) it’ll take a little bit.”
(you) “Just one question, do you ride a bus?”
(Rai) “No, up here on the mountain we walk down because we are fairly close, just a downward hike.”
(you) “Okay and thanks for answering all my questions.”
(Rai) “It’s no big deal. Somebody was going to answer them, so why not the guy you’re staying with.”
With that, you smile at him, he smiles back, and you jump in the bag, moving things to get comfortable.
(Rai) “You good and ready?”
(you) “Yup.”
(Rai) “Then let’s go.”
Shutting the flap, you jerk back as he seems to be in a light jog (for someone his size anyway). Somewhere on the mountainside, you barely hear Rai whisper something to himself.
(Rai) (whispering and muffled) “Hopefully I don’t rub him the wrong way. Also hoping I can keep James safe.”
(you) (shouting so he can hear) “YOU’LL KEEP ME SAFE, I’M SURE. BESIDES YOU’RE DEFINITELY NOT IRRITATING AT ALL. I WAS MORE WORRIED ABOUT YOU BEING TIRED OF ME.”
You feel Rai stop completely and open his bag.
(Rai) “You heard that!?”
(you) “Barely. And honestly, I’m not tired of you at all. Why would I be, the only thing that might’ve gotten to me was my wake up call, but that was just an awesome alarm clock.”
(Rai) “I’m not tired of you at all either but I can’t be sure about the other way around. Everybody at school seems to get tired of me real quick.”
(you) “I know what that’s like, remember? We may look different but we act similar.”
(Rai) “That’s right. I’m sorry, forget we are almost identical. Thanks for the reminder. Are you sure you’ll be alright?”
(you) “Trust me, I’ll be fine and you’ll do a great job. Now let’s go.”
Before he closes the bag to get moving again, you see him smile and quietly say thanks. You smile back and watch as closes his bag. He takes off again, this time with a little more speed probably because you were being a friend, and you relax, hoping he was being honest about you not being a problem, but then knowing he was, otherwise you would be somewhere else right now. Then…
112222121121112.title: A Rude Awakening

1122221211211121.content:
(Rai) (whispering and muffled) “We’re here.”
You climb to top of the bag and look out through a gap. You notice there aren’t any kids there yet, except for Rai, you, and presumably Ryu and Aura.
(you) “Where is everybody?”
(Rai) “Well I come early enough so nobody is here and I can get to my locker without having a small army in my way.”
(you) “Can’t say I blame you there. So what do you do until class starts?”
(Rai) “Well I would usually go hang with Aura, but with you here, I’ll go get my books and sit beneath a tree.”
(you) “Oh… sorry for ruining your plans.”
Rai thinks about what you said, then realizes the error in what he said.
(Rai) “I didn’t mean it like that. What I meant is I sometimes go hang with Aura, but more often sit under a tree and today will be another day under the tree, just with you here.”
(you) “Okay. You had me feeling bad”
(Rai) “Sorry about that.”
Rai arrives at his locker, opens it, and opens the flap to the bag, letting the hallway lights shine in and letting you see out. Rai then pulls out a few pencils, an eraser, a pen and a few books. With great caution, he sets all the supplies in the bag without setting them on top of you. He looks at his locker to make sure he has everything, then shuts his locker. He looks down in the bag and shifts the books so he can see you.
(Rai) “Are you okay in there? I can always come back and get my books later if you aren’t comfortable”
(you) “I’m fine. Don’t trouble yourself too much over my well being. Besides these books make a little more cover so nobody can see me and your eraser is comfortable to lay on.”
You then lay back on it and look up at Rai. You notice he’s chuckling and shaking his head.
(Rai) “Whatever you say boss. Just don’t get mad if I knock you off because I need that eraser for class.”
(you) “I doubt I will. You are the one who needs it and I am not in any position of power anyway. So if you need it, take it. Just one request.”
(Rai) “Yeah, what is it?”
(you) “If you can, please try not to throw me around or at least no too much. I don’t know how long I can last being thrown around.”
(Rai) “I’ll try my best to keep you from flying around.”
(you) “Thanks Rai.”
You smile up at him and he returns the smile.
(Rai) “It’s no big deal, James. Well I don’t know about you, but I’m going to go sit beneath a tree.”
You chuckle and nod. He then shuts the flap and appears to be heading outside. You get comfortable and listen to Rai say good morning to a few pokemon, always saying mister or misses before he said a name. You guessed they were teachers and listen to the variety in the voices. A little later, you hear a door open and eventually feel Rai stop and sit. You crawl through the gap in the bag and climb atop Rai, silently and carefully.
(you) “I can see why you like sitting beneath trees. So calm and quiet.
(Rai) “Ahhhh!” (breathing heavy for a little bit then returning to normal.) I don’t mean to be rude, but wasn’t the agreement for you to come to school with me, but you stay in the bag for safety reasons.”
(you) “Sorry, you’re right. I just wanted to get out and see what the world looked like in a more urban setting.”
(Rai) “It’s alright, just make sure you hurry your looking around up. All the kids come around this time and if they see you, you might as well as stay out of the bag and socialize.”
You lock up when he says socialize. You high tail it back to the bag and jump back in. You hear Rai laughing at your performance.
(you) “You know if our positions were switched, you would do the same thing.”
(Rai) “I know that as well as you do, but they’re not and I found it comical how quick you went back in the bag. (slight pause) Well it’s a good thing you did when you did, because here’s the bus now. If you wanna take a peek at the kids, go ahead. Just make sure you’re in enough so they don’t see you.”
