"I hope they're okay...." a (female?) voice tenderly said to someone nearby. "I don't think they came to any harm or so to say, but being out cold isn't just a naturally occurring event." A male voice responded to the previous worries. Jay slowly opened his eyes a crack to see a massive Lucario on one side and a Giant Zoroark on the other. He immediately sat bolt upright, startling the two before him, trying to understand where he was. Head swinging side to side he found himself in a normal bedroom, except for the fact he may as well have been the size of dust! "Woah, calm down there, are you okay?" The now definitely female zoroark asked, getting within an inch of his now comically small form. "Not physically, but mentally I have way to many questions, such as where I am currently." He promptly said, almost moving back instinctually.
The lucario responds with
112232222222222222211.title: Here we go...

11223222222222222222.content:
Wyatt Jackson

Age: 15

Appearance: Light skin-toned, African American male. light runners body. Light-green eyes. Dark brown, Spike Spiegel hairstyle. Wears a plain, black t-shirt, with black shorts with a red trim, and black slip-on Vans.

Likes: Drawing, writing, being outdoors, puzzles and strategy, naps, animals, sports, peace and quiet.

Dislikes: Large crowds, being underestimated, loud noises, leadership, conflict.

Personality: Reserved, sarcastic sometimes, respects others as long as it's given back, simple, straight-forward, calm and collected.
11223222222222222222.title: Wyatt Jackson

112232222222222222221.content:
I sling the strap of my bag on my shoulder as I leave my house. I walk shrouded in the morning mist on my way to the bus stop for school. I walk up a sloped road next to a soccer field. I yawn, drowsy from early wake up. I stop and close my eyes. I tell myself "its for a few seconds." When I opened my lead-heavy eyes, The fog became more dense. My sight was obscured, losing sight my surrounding.
I began to feel slight tremors. Then a deep voice "COME ON... YENA, RIKO, LUNA, WERE GOING BE LATE FOR SCHOOL." I turn to the sound of shouting. The fog dissipates and I find myself on a trail with ginormous towering trees, I stand paralyzed with shock. "I don't remember walking on this path to the bus stop." I mutter to myself.
The tremors became powerful, I stumble toward the roots of a nearby tree. The tremors stop as the last one knocks me on the ground. I look upward at the cause. A massive Mightyena the size of a three-story building appeared. I made use of my small size and hid low against one of the roots. A Houndour walked next to it. It was slightly smaller than the Mightyena, but equally massive and terrifying to me. I held back my breathe a little and hoped they would walk off. The Mightyena spoke, "I'm sorry for my siblings, they can be sluggish in the morning. You can go on without me Ruby." Then Ruby the Houndour replied, "It's okay Ren, I can wait." Then three Poochyena walked over. "Sorry big brother, we're tired." One of them spoke. Then the three yawned in unison.
I closed my eyes, It felt like I was dreaming, and maybe I was. the poochyena were the size of a large truck. "What's This Thing?" The voice I opened my eyes to ended up being one the poochyena, two meters from my position, with crimson eyes locked on to mine. I stood up and tried to slowly back away. I back up against the tree forgot about. I'm trapped between a tree and five humongous canine Pokemon.
The Poochyena tried to take a step forward, but the Mightyena spoke, "Riko step back from it." Riko stopped and looked up to Ren. "But big brother." Ren answered with an intimidating glare, and Riko submissively stepped away. Then one named Ren got close and tried to lower himself to my level. "I'm sorry, forgive my little brother Riko. My name is Ren." Ren said with a gentle demeanor. I nervously spoke, "I'm Wyatt." I was sure to be careful around Ren, he put his younger brother in his place with just a glare. "So you can speak. Well Wyatt, can you tell me more about yourself?" Ren asked. I was at a loss for words. I collected myself and explained my situation. I thought if I just complied with whatever he asked, it would be less trouble. "So you're a human, and you were going to school, but you somehow found yourself here. Strange, I've heard of humans, but I thought you guys were a myth. I'll help you get back to your home the best I can, and I'll keep you safe too." Ren replied. I felt less anxious around Ren, he seemed more genuine and mature, and he made my situation seem less stressful, maybe I can trust him
112232222222222222221.title: The Fog

1122322222222222222211.content:
Ren had me climb to the top of his head, between his two large ears. he told me that he was going to get more information on my situation at his School library.
He introduced me to his siblings as he walked. "You've met my brother Riko, the other two are my sisters, Yena and Luna, and the Houndour next to me is Ruby." "I'm Wyatt, It's nice to meet you all." The three Poochyena ran excitedly around Ren until he used his intimidation tactic, calming them down. Ruby had a small smile, but she kept to herself. "You said you all were going to your school. is that right Ren?" I asked. "Yeah." Ren replied. "Are you all students, and what's it like there?" Ren spoke, "Yes, all of us are, the young ones here are in a beginners course. Ruby and I are in a more advanced course, we all learn basic math, reading and writing, some extracurriculars, and a battle strategies class. Once we're in the advance course, we choose to advance in dungeon exploration or gym battles. The classes are okay and the other students there can be tolerable, but I'll have to ask you to stay hidden for your safety." "Okay Ren, I will stay out of sight." I replied. we get to the end of the trail and the Pokemon school comes into view. Along with several other students. I ask, "Um, is there a good place for me to hide Ren?" "Just hide in the fur on my back for now." I slide down the back of Ren's head, into the black fur on his back. It was thick enough to conceal me.
They continued on as if I didn't exist. Ruby left for her homeroom. Ren dropped off Riko, Yena, and Luna at their homerooms. Then headed to his homeroom, on his way, he got a hello from a group Pokemon, I had to guess were his friends. he is the first and only Pokemon who enters his homeroom and sits at his desk near the back. "Wyatt, are you doing okay?" I pop my head out and reply with "Yes." "Luckily, we'll be in the library for my first period, I'll find what information I can, Also I'll find good spots throughout the day for you to pop your head out for quick breathers, okay." I nodded in confirmation and dove back in his fur.
The classroom was filled in seconds, and the first bell rang. Ren sat quietly as the other students conversed with each other. The same group of Pokemon that greeted him, tried to pull him into one of their conversations, he gave some small talk, but went quiet again. Then a Zoroark entered the room and walked to the desk up front. She began the roll call, at some point she calls on Ren, "Here!" he answers. Then we wait for the next bell. Ren's fur gives a nice, warm feeling and his rhythmic breathing forces my eyes shut. "For a few seconds." I whisper to myself as take a "quick" nap.
1122322222222222222211.title: Ren

11223222222222222222112.content:
I'm having a hard time keeping my eyes open. It felt unfair to take a nap in the fur of my new friend, but I close my eyes once more. "Wyatt, I'm in a good spot in the library, you can take a breather." I pop out to Ren's voice, with eyes still shut. I pry my eyes open, "Sorry, I'm not a morning person, And your fur feels great to be honest. I'll try my best stay awake." Ren replies, "I understand, it can be a torture to stay awake. You can rest in my fur for awhile. I'll find what I can and tell you as soon as you wake up." I didn't think he'd be this understanding. "Thank you, but why are you helping me?" I ask. "It seemed right, and I think it's better for me to help you before someone unfavorable gets ahold of you." Before I can respond another Pokemon called out to Ren. I duck back into Ren's fur quickly. I peer out a little, and it was another Mightyena, but it was slightly bigger than Ren.
"Good morning Riku, how is your morning?" Ren said giving his attention to the books on the shelf in front of him. "Its been okay. Are you staying after school? The battle club wants know if you're coming today?" Ren moves away slightly."I can't Riku, I have important stuff to do today." Riku Replies, "Are you sure, you've missed three weeks. if it's about your brother and sisters..." Ren cuts him off, "No, I'm just not interested in battling, and I already told you I have stuff to do." Riku tries to add a "but", but Ren gives a menacing glare."I thought I said no!" Ren is slightly smaller, and he can terrifyingly put others in their place with only a glare. I definitely know not to mess with Ren. He's been nice enough, but it's terrifying to question him, which I'm glad I didn't. Riku walks off. I pop back out and look up to Ren.
"Wyatt... Do I terrify you?" Ren asked in a low voice. "You can be... but you've been kind to me... And we've just met." I replied. We both remained silent for a few minutes. "I know I can trust you though." I blurted out. Ren looked surprised at what I said. "You trust me?" "Yes, because you're proving it by helping me." I replied. "If you trust me enough, then I promise to never let anyone harm you." He said as he stared at me with gentle, but determined eyes. I gave him a nod and ducked once more into his fur. Ren went back to searching for answers.
Before the period ended, Ren found material that referenced humans. He told me he would go over it during lunchtime. I rest through a couple of periods until we are...
11223222222222222222112.title: Trustworthy

choices: Ren's Team find the flag first
112232222222222222221122.content:
I wake up to Ren's voice. "Hey Wyatt, are you doing okay." I pop my head out of his fur. I notice he's walking outside. " Yeah, I just woke up." I replied as I yawned. "Sorry, but it will be better if you're awake. We're in my dungeon exploration class, and the possibility of a battle will happen." Ren said. "I understand, and don't worry I feel more awake now that I got some rest. I'll keep my grip tight during the fight." I replied. He nods as he continues on.
"Is this class held outside?" I ask "Sometimes, there are training grounds around the school, we're heading to the Forest Dungeon." Ren answered. I was gonna ask another question, but I hid back in Ren's fur as two Pokemon greeted him. One was a Grovyle, the other was a Braviary. They both were more massive than Ren. Ren greeted them back, "Hello, Skylar... Sakura. Do any of you know who we're up against for today's course." The Braviary, Skylar answered, "We'll be up against Arcanine's team." Then Sakura added," It'll be a challenge since it's them." Then I heard Ren asked, "Sakura, Skylar, I can't tell you why, and it might be a lot to ask, but can you keep my back protected?" They both nodded in agreement without question. Ren and the other Pokemon arrive at their destination.
The same Zoroark from homeroom was there waiting for all her students to arrive. She begins a brief lecture and states objective of today's assignment. "For today, two teams will be racing for a flag In this forest, both teams must find and battle for the flag. The team that finds the flag must bring it back here to win the match. Team Ren and Team Arcanine are today's matchup." I tried to get a glimpse of the opposing team, Ren was going against. It was Arcanine as the Leader, then Weavile, and Dewott. Arcanine walks up to Ren, "Let's make this a great match, good luck." Ren looks up to him unfazed by the fact that his opponent is many times larger than he is. "Sure, whatever." Ren replies walking away. It felt nerve-racking, my grip tightened as Ren walked toward his teams entrance. Ren whispered as he felt my tug "It will be a rough ride Wyatt, but I'll keep you safe."
112232222222222222221122.title: Dungeon Exploration Course

1122322222222222222211222.content:
"BEGIN!" The Zoroark shouts. Then both teams sprint into the forest. I can hardly feel Ren's movements. He dashes through the root covered terrain effortlessly. His two teammates, Sakura and Skylar were following behind him. Ren looks back to Skylar giving him a silent command. Skylar soaring through the air, ascends above the trees out of sight. After two minutes while running, Skylar returns and gives his aerial assessment. "I've spotted the flag, continue running forward. There will be clearing up ahead." Ren replies, "That's too easy... What about the other team, did you see anyone from that group?" "No, I haven't seen any of them." Skylar answered. Ren gives a warning. "Skylar... Sakura... Stay alert, They might be plotting an ambush." "Right" Skylar and Sakura spoke simultaneously.
They stop at the edge before the forest clearing. The flag could be seen under a tree in the middle of the clearing. The tree was five meters away from a stream of water. Ren gives Sakura one of his silent commands. She uses double team and rushes toward the flag, Then a fire based attack was launched at her. She dodges, and Ren sends another silent signal. Skylar ascends to provide air support. Ren jumps out in the clearing to support Sakura. As he did, Arcanine charges toward Sakura. I tightened my grip on Ren as he leapt in front of Sakura. He then moved low and quick within Arcanine's range. Arcanine's momentum shifted as he hesitated, and Ren used his bite attack, latching on to Arcanine's neck, lifting the large hound Pokemon off the ground, over him and slams him to the ground with a monumental "Boom." I recollect myself from Ren's monumental feat and notice a Pokemon's shadow. Midair, Weavile was launching his attack on Ren's backside. I noticed Ren was distracted, so I tugged on his fur to alert him. Ren notices and splashes a sand attack at Weavile with his left back paw. Blinding his attacker, Weavile drops to the ground.
Ren releases Arcanine and shouts "Sakura the water!" seconds before Dewott jumps out, attacking with razor shell. Sakura reacts and counters with leaf blade, leaving both to a stalemate. Arcanine tries to recover with a fire attack, but got shutdown by Skylar swooping down and pinning him to the ground. I was astonished by Ren's battling. He countered two attacks without a scratch and noticed an attack before it was launched. He was well coordinated with his teammates, they moved flawlessly, even without him barking a command. Ren turns to Weavile. He recovers from Ren's sand attack. Ren charges at Weavile, connecting a headbutt. Weavile gets pushed back, but endures the attack. He begins to taunt Ren to attack. I tug on Ren's fur to caution him, I'm no battle expert, but I could tell that Weavile has something shady planned. Ren takes my tug to heart and keeps his cool. Until Weavile baited him again "What's wrong Ren, afraid to attack with that tiny human on your back." Everyone, even I was surprised with the words that came out of his mouth. "I saw you in the library this morning. I know about that insignificant creature hiding in your fur." I could feel vibrations running off Ren's body, his fur stood up, growling was produced. Ren got in a protective stance. I tugged once more at Ren's fur, but it did little effect to calm him down. It was clear, Ren was about ripe out a throat, and Weavile was baiting him, pushing the buttons no one expected him to push. "Come on Ren, little Wyatt might get hurt! Why do you think I tried to attack from behind." Ren rushed furiously toward him. Weavile sneaks an ice beam attack, freezing one of Ren's back paws to the ground, causing Ren to lurch forward and plummet to the ground. I lose my grip and fly out of Ren's fur."Oh No... Ren!" I shout as I plummet to the ground two inches in front of Ren's face. The landing knocks the air out of me.
"No! Wyatt... Please be okay." Ren cried out. "Yeah Wyatt, please be okay!" Weavile mocking Ren. I tried to pull in whatever air I could get. Ren glared furiously at Weavile for his mockery. I uttered until I got my voice back, "Ren stop..." I slowly sit up. Ren stares down at me. "Ren, you need to calm down. He's baiting you... playing you... he wants you to make your mistakes. I know you're better than that." "But you got hurt..." Ren whimpered. "It was only a little fall. I'll be okay." I said as I stood up, giving Ren a thumbs-up. "Wow Ren, I didn't think you'd be this pathetic around an insignificant creature like that human. If I had your reputation and skill, it would be a completely different story. I'm going to take the human, but don't worry, I won't go overboard and kill him. It's time I end this." Weavile spoke while charging his ice beam. Ren took his right paw, and pulled me into his chest. He held himself over me to shield me from the attack. Then Skylar and Sakura jumped in front of Ren to guard the two of us. "What the..!" Weavile yelled as a loud "Thud" was heard. A familiar voice called out, "Sorry kids, but I'm calling this match." Ren loosened his grip. I peer out to the voices origin. "Mrs. Kino..." Ren uttered. It was the Zoroark, holding down Weavile. "Class is dismissed, and I want everyone here in my office now! Including you human!" She commanded.
Ren pulls himself free from the ice. "So you're the reason Ren asked us to defend him." Sakura said as her and Skylar strolled up to us."Yeah, I'm sorry for causing trouble." I replied. "Don't apologize, we wished Ren would confide in us more. I'm Skylar, it's a pleasure to meet you." "Yeah, and I'm Sakura." I introduce myself, "I'm Wyatt Jackson. just call me Wyatt." Once I said my name, the Zoroark gave a look I couldn't explain. Ren nudged my back with his crimson nose. I turn to him. His ears drooped and he looked toward the ground. "I'm sorry... Wyatt... I got reckless and it got you hurt." I began to stroke his muzzle and looked up to his eyes. "Ren, I told you I'm okay, and I'm not upset at you. I'm happy that it didn't turn out too badly, and come on... You were awesome!" Ren's face started to lighten up and I heard tail wagging. "I was?!" What I said cheered him up. Ren lowers himself and motions for me to climb on him. I sat on top of his head and stroked his fur. "You promised to protect me, so I'll promise to stay by your side, okay." Ren happily barked, "Okay!" We all left the forest and followed Mrs. Kino to her office. It looked like she dismissed the entire class before she stopped the battle. I wonder what she'll say when we get to her office.
1122322222222222222211222.title: Fighting Gets Dirty

11223222222222222222112222.content:
I hide back in Ren's fur as Mrs. Kino commanded, she wanted me to stay out of sight until we were in her office. Ren and I were outside her office as she gave Weavile a lecture along with a detention. Then one by one she pulled others from the incident in her office. Quietly having her one on one discussions. Minutes went by, until Sakura exits. "You may enter Ren! Thank you Sakura, and can you close the door behind Ren." Ren enters the office and the door behind him was shut. "Wyatt, you can come out. Ren help him on to my desk" Kino commands. I climb out of Ren's fur back to the top of his head. Ren walk to the desk and lets me off. Kino begins, "How long has it been since you've arrived, and how long have you've both known each other? Tell me everything." Ren was about to speak, "No Ren, I want to hear this from Wyatt." Kino interrupted. I told her everything I knew that happened. She took a few minutes to process what I said. "I know why you're here Wyatt, but before I tell you both..." Kino walks over to Ren. She grabs and violently shakes him yelling, "REN, YOU IDIOT! I thought I taught you better than to act recklessly! Not only that, you brought Wyatt into a dangerous mock battle too, you're lucky I intervened when I did!" she stops and releases him. "It would've been a horrific end if I didn't... Not for you, but for Wyatt. Don't do anything stupid like that again! Do you understand!" Ren wore the look of disappointment, and replies, "Yes Ma'am."
Kino's gaze turned to me. "Now Wyatt, tell me... How's Izzy been doing." I stared at Kino with shock as she wore a grin. "How do you know my nana's name?" I asked. She replies. "Well... She's a nana now. I can't imagine her at an old age. She was my partner, and like you she found herself here too. I'm shocked she never mentioned me to you." It was too much to process, I wondered what more she had to say. "She used to visit sometimes. Too bad she lost her abilities... Wyatt you're one of the next set of children here to help us." I looked to Ren, he sat attentively. I turned back to Kino. "There's a darkness sealed away under the island, and you're here because of it. Your nana and I, along with many others battled that darkness many years ago. You're a Shadow Child, one of the children. What you did was pass safely over between our worlds. Only you are born with this ability to do so, like Izzy and your Mother." I shout with shock, "Wait... My Mom was here too!?" "Yes, like you they found themselves here. They came here for their first time without knowing how or why. Izzy was a young girl when she came here. I was a Zorua when we met." Kino paused and looked as if she were reminiscing her time with her human friend. "Sorry to interrupt, but you said Nana lost her abilities, what happened?" A frown appeared on Kino's face, "Your Mother came to this world, but in the wrong place and at a terrible time. It was a while since Izzy visited, but she came to me at night, she was worried for her daughter, and knew her daughter would appear here someday. I helped Izzy track down your Mom. We found her next to the seal. We named you a Shadow Child, because of your ability to draw power and manipulate your own shadows. One of the creatures we sealed... it took both their shadows from them. The loss weakened them both. I got them both away from the seal. Helped them get back to your world, but I never saw them again. What happened to them afterward remained a mystery to me. It's why I asked about Izzy."
"Mrs. Kino, you said Wyatt was one of the children. Who are the others, and how do you know we need Wyatt's help?" Ren asks. Kino replies, "I don't know who the others are, but I've spotted from dusk to night to dawn 8 of the children falling from the sky. It's a sign that the seal is breaking, and I believe someone foolish is trying to release that darkness. Ren do you recall the Legend of the Nine Heroes?" Ren nodded at the question. "Yeah, the heroes of Joy, Sorrow, Rage, Peace, Courage, Wisdom, Willpower, Light, and Darkness. Why are you asking?" Kino answers, "Wyatt... Ren... you both are going to have to fight tough opponents. From fellow Pokemon, dark creatures, and some of the other children. Remember you both have to work together along with the other 8 children. I'm limited with what I can do, and I have to monitor everything that's going on in this place, so I can't help you 100% of the way. I want you both to be careful, find and meetup with the other children." I turn back to Ren and we nod to each other. "Before I dismiss you both, I have something for you Wyatt." Kino pulls out something wrapped in cloth between her two claws. She hands me the parcel. I unwrap the cloth to find a stack of notebooks. "Before Izzy left for good, she left me notes to give you. It's on everything you want to know. There's info on how to use your shadow, the Night Creatures, what little she know on the other children and more." I climb back on Ren's head, and thank Mrs. Kino, "Thank you! And Mrs. Kino... Izzy's doing fine, I can see where my nana gets her spunk from." Kino smiled and dismissed us. I stash the books in my bag, and hid back in Ren's fur. The school bell rings, Ren chimes "It's lunch time!"
11223222222222222222112222.title: A Shadow Child - The Hero of Darkness

112232222222222222221122222.content:
Ren exits the school building and walks off. "There's a quiet place for us to have lunch, and you'll be able to stretch your legs too." Ren spoke. "Okay what about food? I didn't see you grab anything on the way out." I replied. "Don't worry, It's already there." Ren answered. I turn and lie on my back. I watch the white cloud filled sky as Ren walked. I close my eyes and listen to the surrounding sounds. Ren's paws lightly hitting the ground, his rhythmic breathing, the wind blowing, the birds chirps and flying. "Do you go to this mystery spot with food already there, often?" I ask. "Since I was a Poochyena, the cafeteria can get obnoxiously loud." Ren answers. "I get it. I hate when it gets loud, and talking over it can be a..." "Pain." Ren finishes. "Yeah..." I reply. "It's a great to be outside today, the clouds are nice." I said. "Yeah." Ren replies. "
"Now that we know what's going on. What should we do now?" I ask. I wait for Ren's answer, "...I don't know, why are you asking me?" "Well, I want you to have a say in what we do, and I feel like you always know what to do." I answer. Ren stops walking. "I don't know where to start..." I open my eyes and sit up. "Ren, It's okay... To be honest, I have no idea what I should do. I've been useless, and you're doing all the work. I can't do this by myself, but I can't let you do it by yourself either. You're my friend Ren." Ren starts walking again, but he doesn't respond. After five minutes, Ren stops, "We're here, Wyatt." Ren spoke. "Are you upset with me?" I ask. I feel Ren lower himself down to the ground gently. "Wyatt, come on down." I froze. "Wyatt, please come on down." I was frightened, thinking that I messed up. I stand up and climb down his left side. He stands up and faces me. I'm staring at the ground. "Wyatt, I'm not upset. Why do you think I'm upset at you." I shrug. "Wyatt, I'm surprised you would call me your friend, I enjoy being with you, and you aren't useless!" Ren replied. I looked up to him, and he continued, "You helped me in battle by only tugging on my fur, you calmed me down when I got reckless, and you've stayed positive throughout your time with me. We have more information, and I want you to have a say too. I'll do what you need me to do. Don't be afraid ask me for guidance. I'll always be here to help." Ren walks over to a nearby tree and uses a headbutt on it. A few large apples fell from the tree. Ren picks one up and brings it over. He placing it before me. "Before we decide on what to do. We should eat!" Ren said lying down, wagging his black, furry tail.
Ren takes a claw and shaves a large piece of the apple off for me. I take the piece and sit right next to his left paw. We silently eat our apple. Ren was right, his secret spot was peaceful. We sat under a tree, facing a pond of water in front of us. I listen to the sounds of water, as it entered and exited its' reservoir. I finish my apple and pull out the notebooks from my bag. There were Ten color-coded notebooks, one for me, one on the creatures, and one on each child. Ren finishes his apple and looks over. I turn to him. "Which one should I pick up first?" I ask Ren. "We could do your's first." Ren answers. "Before I pick up my book. Mrs. Kino told us to find the other children, Right?" I ask. "Yeah, what do you want to do?" Ren asked. "I think finding them all will be a pain, so before we meetup with any of them we should let them gather on their own. If they're like me, they might be partnered with a Pokemon already." Ren nods, "When we get back, we'll covertly scout for any potential partnerships. When we find one of the children, we'll wait for the rest to gather and then join. While they're gather, we can use the time to gain more information and we'll train too." I finish. "Yeah, the window of time we'll have before we join them is enough to give us a chance to prepare. Mrs. Kino never said when we should join them, so let's use the time we have." Ren agreed. I turn back to the notebooks and pick up mine. I flip the black cover over to view page one.
I flip through the thin, black book to see how much info there was, It was filled. I flip back to page one and begun reading out loud. "Log 1. Isabel. Once again I've lost. I've taken on everyone of the other kids. They're already mastering their abilities. I can only manage paralysis with my shadow, and force my target to mimic my movements. Kino has been supportive with my training, but I'm frightened, I don't want to hurt anyone. Kino told me I should let her focus on the fighting, but I don't want to leave it all to her. I want to get stronger to support her!" After the first couple of sentences, I realized it. "This is a diary!" I said, Under the paragraph were sketches of a shadow technique, and under that were requirements for the technique. I get up for an attempt, but before I start, I hear a bell. "Lunch is over." Ren spoke. I close the book and put the notes in my bag. "I guess we're pushing pause on my book." Ren lowers himself, and I climb on. I ask Ren, "Do you remember what to do when we get back." Then Ren answers, "Yeah, I'll keep a look out during my last remaining periods." We nod to each other. I hide back in Ren's fur.
112232222222222222221122222.title: Have lunch outside

choices: No sorry, I want a new character.
12.content:
Name: Ameira Ambrose
Age: 17
Interests/hobbies: sports, reading, music and piano. Likes all animals (bugs, not so much)
Dislikes: spiders and creepy crawlies.
Appearance: soft brown curly hair, tall and curvy, hazel and violet flecked eyes. Purple tank top and cut off jeans. Also carrying a black back pack (contains a mobile phone, iPod, a few books, a wallet with ID and $20, some band-aids, safety pins and a few pain killers, some food and a bottle of water)
Personality: strong willed, fun loving, risk taker, hard on the outside but soft and kind on the inside. Loves to sit down with a good book when not playing sports or hanging out with friends.

The scenario- walking back from your bestfriends friends place after a picnic at the locak park with a group of friends. You suddenly trip and fall, hitting your head on the pavement.
You then wake up in a stange place....

Will you continue the story with Ameira?
12.title: Female.

choices: Scream... It might scare it off
Speak to it, it might be friendly..... Or not.
Step backwards, putting as much space between you and "it" as possible
121.content:
You wake up grogily. You can feel yourself laying in something soft. It feels like grass.
You open your eyes slowly and notice that you are in a huge clearing in a forest. Your first thought was * Jeesh, how tall are the trees?*. After a minute or two you start to realize that you weren't in a forest before. You were walking back from Beth's house (your best friend) after the picnic with Sarah, Aaron, Ricky, Leah and Zara. *Where the heck am I?* you think next.
You get up, and quickly notice that it wasn't just the trees that were bigger than you. Everything was massive, you feel like an insect compares to everything else. Scared and very confused, you look around wildly. You start to panic, and suddenly something steps out behind a tree. It's hidden by shadow, so you can't see what (or who) it is. The dark figure is much bigger than you, and you imidiantly feel intimidated. You....
121.title: Yes! What happenes next???

1211.content:
As you see the massive dark figure drawing closer to you, you begin to freak out. Its sheer size had you terrified, and in a desperate attempt to scare it away, you immediately screamed out at the top of your lungs. The instant that the scream left your lungs, the massive figure seemingly jumped backward in fear before turning around and curling up into a ball. You then heard several sniffles and realized that your plan had worked a little too well.

Whatever the massive creature was, you had just scared it to tears. You couldn't believe it, but the enormous being whose mighty stature completely dwarfed your own was even more terrified than you were. You could tell that it was trembling, and you saw several large teardrops falling. Seeing how scared this thing was of you, you felt absolutely terrible about what you did. Reaching out, you proceed to stroke the large creature's back to try and calm it down. Unfortunately, in its nervous state, this had the opposite effect. The instant that your hand touched its back, the creature jumped and backed away from you nervously.

"No! Please don't hurt me!" it cried out in fear.

You realized that its voice was like that of a very young girl; and given the feminine voice, you made out that the creature was in fact female. Wanting to calm her down after your little stunt made her so terrified, you speak up in a calm voice.

"Don't worry, I'm not going to hurt you. I'm sorry for yelling at you, so please don't be afraid."

"R-really? Y-you promise that you're not going to hurt me?" she said, trying to wipe the tears from her eyes.

"Of course not. I couldn't even hurt you if I wanted to. To be honest, I only screamed because I was afraid of you..."

"You were afraid of me? Why?" she asks, beginning to finally calm down.

"Why don't you just turn around and see for yourself."

At that point, the young female creature slowly turned around and looked down at you. Seeing you there, her eyes lit up as she scooped you off the ground.

"Oh my, you're so cute and tiny! Now I get it... You were scared 'cause I'm so big compared to you, weren't you?" She asks, rubbing you into her cheek.

"Yeah. Now could you please put me down?"

"Ah, sure. Sorry about that, little guy. I just couldn't resist." She says with a cheerful smile taking over her face.

"It's okay, don't worry about it. I'm just glad to know that you aren't going to hurt me." You say with a laugh.


You then look up at the creature, and getting your first good view of her appearance, you instantly recognize her as being a Pokemon! But not just any Pokemon; she was a...
1211.title: Well, that was a mistake...

“I need to tell you a story first so it all makes sense.” Mew informed the three of you. “are you ready to listen?” All three of you quietly nodded and sat down. “Alright.” Mew said getting ready to tell her story. “400 years ago there was a war with an evil race of monsters known as the night crawlers.

Day after day they would come to the island and caused chaos and destruction. When all hope was lost, 9 brave hero’s came to fight those monsters. These hero’s where the hero’s of Joy, Sorrow, Rage, Peace, Courage, Wisdom, Willpower, Light, and Darkness*. These Pokemon had power that others can only dream of having. The 9 Hero’s slain the monsters as if they where nothing and returned peace to the land.

Even though the monsters kept retuning the 9 Hero’s always destroyed them. Then one day a giant monster came to the island. This monster known as the destroyer was so large that it could destroy the island with one swing of his claw. The 9 Hero’s confronted the monster but, the monster was just to powerful for them to defeat. But just before all hop was lost the Hero’s combined into one and defeated the monster.

Even though the monster was no more a peace of the monsters essence still remanded. The 9 Hero’s took the essence to a secret island and with all there power sealed it in a cave with an unbreakable barrier. With the world at peace again the 9 Hero’s left the island never to be heard from again. But before they left the they sent an essence from each one of the 9 Hero’s to another dimension to find a successor.

The successors of these hero’s are known as Commit Children and have the amazing powers of the hero’s. Because of the time of peace we have had we never needed to call upon them…Until now.”
*The colors of each Hero to commit(Yellow, Blue, Red, Green ,Orange, Purple, Grey, White, and Black)

"Shadow Clone jutsu." then you make clone of yourself and it distracts Moltres. The you leap tree to tree and get your kunai. You turn to it and throw your kunai.it dodges and destroy you clone. Then you make then next hand sign. "Fire Style : Fireball jutsu." Then you spit a giant fireball and it engulfs the giant fire bird. Then it was blown away. "What the... Thats right he is a fire type... Tch. Doesn't matter I can't give up." you think to yourself. Then you use your sharingan. "You have the same eyes as your brother and definitely share his skills." The Moltres said. "What did you... You mean know my brother." You reply. "Yes. he was a prodigy. The reason I came here is so I can test to see your strength but it seems you carry that special blood just like your brother. " Moltres replies. "It seems you have long way to go too. When I sparred with your brother, his sharingan was way more developed." "Thanks, I guess." You said with a pouted face. "Sorry, I guess it's been long since I've seen you brother and your eyes reminded me of him. How is he." Moltres said. "He's..." you said. "Oh." Moltres replies. "Well its time." "Time for what." you ask. "That I took you to a special item that has come from your clans ancestor." Moltres says. "Let's go." Then Moltres Lowers his body next to the branch your on and you climb on his back.

12211211122111111121111111111121.content: Moltres flies toward a small island. You see a forest with a shrine in the middle. "Here we are." Moltres said. Then Moltres lands on the islands beach and you jump off his back. "Follow the path and get to the shrine." Moltres says. "What. Your not coming." you reply. "No, I'm not able to pass into the forest. You must do this alone." Then You go to the entrance and walk in. Then you make it to the shrine and see an alter with an Uchiha crest on it. The walk up to the alter and see a sword lying on the alter. Next you pick it up an draw it from its hilt. You examine it's sharp edge and tip. Then you sheath it and take it. You walk out of the forest and see Moltres and he asks. "Did you get it?" Then you show him. "Is this it." You reply. "Yes. That's it." He says. "What is so special about this sword." you ask. Then he says. " This is the Sword of Kusanagi. It was used by one of your ancestors and his name was Sasuke Uchiha. It was passed on to your brother and he kept and hid it so that you would get it. It is said that this blade was able to cut and pierce through almost anything." "Thank you." You said sincerely. "Come on its time I took you back to your friends." Moltres says. Then he lowers himself and you get on his back then he flies off. Then he reaches the house and drops you off. "Oh and don't forget. Your not alone in this fight." he says. Then he flies off and you walk in the house. "I'm back." You shout. "Oh Thank Arceus. Where we're you." Flint says. "Yeah we were worried sick. Are you okay." Nova replies.. Then you say. "Yes. Sorry for worrying you." "What happened out their." Flint asks. Then you tell them what happened and Nova replies. "Okay so you were with Moltres and he helped you get a sword." You reply "This isn't just a regular sword. Their must be something about it or it wouldn't be here. I heard stories that when Sasuke used it he was able to cut and pierce through anything and he also was able to channel lightening style energy to increase it's sharpness." " Yeah you must be right. If their is something about it Moltres wouldn't have taken you to it. Just keep it with you okay." Flint says. Then your stomach growls. "You have anything for dinner." you ask. "Sure." Nova replies. Then you finish your dinner and get to Flints room. "This was a crazy day." you say. "Tell me about it." Flint replies. Then you both fall asleep.
12211211122111111121111111111121.title: The Sword of Kusanagi.

122112111221111111211111111111211.content: "Hey Ibuki, Wake up it's time for school." you wake up and say. " I'm up." Then you get up and get ready. "Hey Flint." "What is it." Flint replies. "Umm, mind if you help me teach James and Rai." You ask. "Umm, sure." Flint replies. "Thanks." Then you get to school, and go throughout the day without problems. Then you and Flint get to the training ground and meet James and Rai. "So what do you want to know." Then James says. "I Don't know just something that might help us get better." "Okay, how about we use the basics. Try to hit me." you reply. "But your clearly know how to fight." James replies. "Don't worry it's to look at your stance and form, and I'll be using my sharingan." "If you say so." then you activate your sharingan and James gets into a stance and runs toward you with an iron fist. You dodge and saw the form of his attack. He comes back for another attack and you dodge that one. Then you say. "I've seen enough you can stop now." "So what do you think." James replies. " I've noticed you were a little off balances on both attacks, other than that you don't have any problems. What about you Rai?" "I... I don't know." "How about you and Flint have a little fist fight. If that's okay, Flint." you stare at Flint to have him help. "Fine." Flint replies. "I guess thats okay." Rai answers. Then they get ready and start to fight. You see Rai hit Flint with such strength but then Flint gets a lot of hits on Rai. Rai tries to hit Flint, but Flint was to fast for him. Then you stop the match. "Thank for the help." you say to Flint then you tell Rai his problem. "I know whats the problem when you hit really hard Flint I was amazing but as soon Flint got some hits on you, You didn't try to block or dodge and plus Flints not as much as big as you are which he was a little faster then you, so you couldn't hit him. You focus to much on the strength of your attack and a little less on your defense. If you defend a little and strike at the right time it might help you out a lot." "Wow, I didn't noticed that before." Rai replies. " I think that's all I have to say to you. I know both will get a lot stronger than before and you might even be able to beat me and just train, it might help you out a little.

Said Flint. " I know and just got this yesterday." you reply. Then the whole team arrives. "Hey guys." Said Flint. " we found another commit child." Said Jet. Then Aura shows up. "Hey guys I'd like you to meet someone." then he holds up a girl. "This is..." "Luna!" you said in surprise. Then you go over and hug her. "You know each other?" Aura replies. "Yeah, we're friends." You Reply. " And we're also partners." Luna adds. "Well, should we start training now." Jet replies. "can I join?" Luna asks. "Sure." Said Jet.

12211211122111111121111111111121111.content: "You want to spar Ibuki?" Jet asks. "Sure." you reply. Then Jet and you go to the center of the field. As usual you activate your sharingan. You see a huge amount of energy coming from him. " This isn't like the the other fights. This is different from those who I fought earlier but now." you thought. "And the thing is he saw my jutsu and fighting style and I wasn't able to get a good look at his. Even though I might still have a chance." Jet comes at you really fast for his attack but you dodge it. " He's fast and that's one thing I should remember." " I'm surprised you were able to dodge that but." Jet says. Then he use an ice beam on the field and the whole field was covered with ice. Then jet came at you again but you jump out of the way again. You land on the ice with no problems and for sure you felt different. More alert, More faster, you feel that something has changed. You draw your sword and see your eyes in the reflection. They were different, more powerful and changed. " My eyes!" you said. You realize the have shape and depth in them. " This is... This is... The Mangykō Sharingan!"

Then you spit a giant fireball at him but he dodges. Then you jump at him and throw your sword at him but he moves out of the way and uses his water gun attack but then you evade it. You land your sword then jump at him again and land a hard kick on the side of his face. "your better then I thought." Jet says. "huff...huff... Your better then I expected myself." you reply. Then you ran up to each other and went for blow for blow.

1222.content:
Name: Cookie
Age: 16
Hobbies: None...
Likes: Children, Helping Others, Dreaming Of Her Parents...
Dislikes: Her Current Lifestyle, High Pitch Noises, Large Bugs, Sharp Needles
Clothes: Her only clothes are a Japanese school uniform similar to the sailor scout uniforms in Sailor Moon, a school swimsuit, and a school gym uniform... All tight on her do to being from Middle School.

Description: When she was 12 years old, about to enter Middle School, she had gotten into a big fight with her parents... And it ended up with her running away from home. She only took three sets of clothes with her... She'd even forgotten her own name since then,,, So she just calls herself Cookie... She somehow managed to stay in school... Until just recently... After four years of no bathing AT ALL, she got kicked out of school for her stench... She had been trying as hard as she could to get a part time job... But for one reason or another she had absolutely no luck int he past four years... She lived in an old, dark alleyway... And the only way she was able to get any food was just by digging around in trashcans... And the only way she got halfway clean drinking water was by hoping it rained...
1222.title: I want a new character.

12221.content:
Cookie, the 16 year old with blue eyes, and shoulder length brown hair, was currently starving... Having skipped both lunch, and dinner the previous day... And now she couldn't find any food at all in the garbage this morning... She was on the verge of just giving up! She clutched her growling stomach, tears forming in her eyes from the pain in her stomach...

Though as she continued digging through the trash to find food, she stumbled upon an old Game Boy Advanced... And inside of it was what looked like a cartridge of Pokemon Emerald Version. Though as she took the game out, she saw that it was titled, Pokemon Emerald Island Version... Odd... Must be some kind of bootleg hack game... 'Anything to keep my mind off of my stomach...' Cookie thought to herself, blowing on the cartridge like she did with her old N64 a long time ago, and popping it back int he game system... She didn't expect it to actually do anything, but as she hit power, the game actually turned on! But instead of a menu with 'Continue', or 'New Game'... It took her directly to a screen with a picture of an Oran Berry just sitting in the grass... Cookie's mouth watered, and her stomach growled at the sight of the fruit... And her finger slipped onto the A button. She felt a small electric shock spark her hand as she did so. "OUCH!" She said... She then began feeling slightly woozie, and a little nauseous... Likely from her hunger pains... She soon found herself fainting...

She woke up who knows how long later... And she was entirely shocked by what she saw when she did so... She was tiny, and in a valley of grassy hills with a few GIANT trees here, and there. But what she really focused on... Was a GIANT Oran Berry sat in the grass right in front of her! her stomach growling, she swiftly dived at the berry, real or not, and starting to sink her teeth into it viciously from hunger. The last thing she could remember was waking up that morning to incredible stomach pains... She was about to go looking through trashcans again... but then everything went black...

Small tremors were felt in the ground, and soon a giggle was heard from behind. Cookie had a feeling she was being watched... But she was so hungry! She just kept devouring the berry as much as she could! Though she was soon interrupted as she was grabbed, and lifted to the face of a MASSIVE...
12221.title: Cookie's Story!

122211.content: "EEP!" Cookie exclaimed as she was lifted. She soon saw that she was at eye level in the grasp of a Kangaskhan! But that was impossible! Pokemon aren't real! They were just in movies, and anime! And by looking at the size comparison... Not only was Cookie only three inches tall! But despite her being huge! This Kangaskhan was just a child! Looking past her, she saw who must have been her mother... There was a picnic blanket, and basket that the mother was sitting on... And looking back to the child who held Cookie in her grasp, she wore an expression of...
122211.title: Kangaskhan +

choices: Kangaskhan Remained Angry, Wanting To Punish Her
Kangaskhan Began To Calm Down A Little...
1222112.content: The young Kangaskhan looked to Cookie with a menacing, angry glare. Cookie gave a small whimper, gazing into the eyes of the young Pokemon who had her in her grasp... "Meanie! That berry was mine!" She said. By the sound of her voice she was at most, ten or so... her voice was so loud to Cookie, and she said it so close to her that Cookie felt her breath as a heat wave! Cookie, being a mixture of confused, and terrified, began to cry... "I-I'm s-sorry! I-I w-was just s-so hungry! P-P-Please d-don't hurt me!" Cookie managed to say through her own tears...
1222112.title: Anger

choices: Mimi Goes Over To Her Mother
Mimi Starts Eating The Berry Too!
12221122.content: Kangaskhan made a pouty face, but lightened her grip a little on the crying human girl... having Cookie sitting on her knees on the Kangaskhan's palm, crying into her hands, Kangaskhan gently pet Cookie's head with a single finger... "Mimi is sorry... Please don't cry... Little bug can has berry..." The Kangaskhan now known as Mimi says as she gently lifts the Oran Berry with her other hand, holding Cookie close to it... Cookie sniffled, and slowly uncovered her still teary eyes, gazing at the fruit... She shakily looked back up to Mimi, who simply nodded to her with a frown... Cookie then took no time in once again diving at the berry, and continuing to eat it, though much more cautiously than she had before...
12221122.title: Kangaskhan Began To Calm Down A Little...

122211221.content:
Mimi gave Cookie a small smile, placing her, and the Oran Berry into her pouch. Cookie found the pouch very comforting, and warm... She simply continued to take small bites from the massive berry as Mimi gently patted her pouch. "Little bug is actually pretty cute... But little bug is stinky..." Mimi said to herself with a little giggle as she began to walk back towards her mother. As Mimi made it over to the blanket, she took a seat on it, and began drinking from a baby bottle that she was very clearly too old for...

Cookie laid back against Mimi's belly, giving a small burp as she placed a hand on her slightly bloated belly... She had never had such a delicious meal for four years! Or maybe even longer! Her only set of clothing int his strange place, now stained with the juice of the berry... Though she didn't care about the outfit! She was just glad to have finally gotten something to eat...

Mimi finishes sipping milk from the bottle, and begins speaking with her mother...
122211221.title: Mimi Goes Over To Her Mother

1222112212.content:
"Can me go to play ground?" Mimi asked her mother, smiling innocently. "Of course sweetie." The mother Kangaskhan said with a smile, licking a finger, and wiping away a bit of... Ketchup... On Mimi's face. "Thankies mommy!" Mimi said with a big smile as she began rushing off. "Don't go too far!" The mother called to her child. "Me won't mommy!" Mimi called back.

Cookie was holding onto Mimi's fur for dear life, trying not to go flying out of the pouch as she ran! "Miss Mimi! Please slow down!" Cookie cried out. Hearing the small voice, Mimi slowed to a halt, and gently took Cookie out from her pouch. Mimi couldn't help but giggle at the look of her. She was covered in blotches of blue coloring from the juice of the berry. Cookie rubbed her head, feeling very dizzy from jostling about, and trying not to go flying! Though as Cookie quickly regained her composure, she looked around her new surroundings... Off in the distance, quite a ways behind Mimi, was her mother sitting on the blanket... Though she looked rather small from here! She must be quite far away... As Cookie looked around more, she saw that she was at some sort of playground... But for Pokemon... Jungle gyms, slides, swing sets, sandboxes, and a few other things. There were a ton of different Pokemon kids playing on the sets, and their parents were likely close by...

Mimi was about to begin playing when another Pokemon from the playground approached her first! It was...
1222112212.title: "Can me go to play ground?"

choices: The Girls Try To Find Out What She Is
They Don't Care, And Go Play
12221122122.content:
A Bulbasaur walked over to Mimi with a smile on it's face. "Hi Mimi!" The Bulbasaur said. Judging by it's voice, it was a female... And maybe around age nine or so... "Hi Daisy!" Mimi said with a smile, waving to the Bulbasaur. The Bulbasaur, apparently named Daisy, couldn't help but take notice of the tiny person in Mimi's hands... "Huh? What is that thing Mimi?" Daisy asked. "Mimi doesn't know... Mimi thinks it's a cute little buggie!" Mimi said with a smile. Daisy leaned in, and sniffed Cookie swiftly turning away, and wrinkling her nose slightly after doing so. "EW!" Whatever it is, it smells nasty! Even with berry juice!" Daisy said. Cookie gave a frown at the insult... Well... It was the truth... After four years of not bathing, it's only natural her aroma would be unpleasant. "Mimi knows Daisy can fix that!" Mimi said with a small giggle. Daisy rolled her eyes, but smiled in reply. "I guess I can..." Daisy said with a small giggle. Two vines came out from underneath the bulb on her back, wrapping themselves around Cookie once. The vines lifted her into the air, over the bulb on Daisy's back...

All that Cookie was able to see in the bulb was pitch blackness, so she began to panic, fearing she might be dropped in. "P-P-PLEASE! P-P-Please d-d-don't!" Cookie cried out, eyes once more tearing up from fear... Though much to her surprise, a cloud a pinkish-purple in color began leaking out of the bulb. The cloud soon enveloped Cookie... It was moist, like a mist, or perfume... And the smell was more fresh than rose...

Mimi simply watched, sniffing the air, and clapping her hands in delight! Daisy used the vines to hold Cookie in front of her face by her ankle. "But what is it anyways?" She asks. "Mimi says it a bug!" Mimi said. Cookie simply gives a whimper, blood rushing to her head from being held upside down...
12221122122.title: Reader's Choice

choices: Of Course I'll Go With Her! +
12222.content:
Name: Jessica Takai
Age: 16
Hobbies: Cooking, Reading Manga, Watching Anime, Playing Video Games
Likes: Cooking, Reading Manga, Watching Anime, Playing Video Games, Her Boyfriend, Her Regular Friends
Dislikes: Many Physical Activities, Most Vegetables, Bugs, Animals
Clothes: A Japanese Style School Uniform (Not That This Will Be Her Only Clothing In The Story Until She Is Given More)

Description: Normally standing around 6'1, Jessica (Or Jess For Short) isn't really a fan of going outside much... She usually prefers to stay in her house, read manga, play games, watch anime and YouTube, that kinda stuff. She's a little chubby, but nothing extreme. She doesn't really exercise, and really doesn't like doing so... Well... She does enjoy using a treadmill from time to time. She isn't one of those girls who is constantly worrying about gaining weight, and just sort of does what she wants most of the time. Her fears include bugs, animals, trying new foods, and a few more things. She's a very kind girl, but she isn't exactly a push over or a yes girl. If you ask her for something she doesn't want to do, she has no problem in saying no to it. She isn't very athletic at all, and can easily be outran by most people...
12222.title: My Own Idea

122221.content: It was February, the cold of winter was just beginning to slowly fade away, but it was still pretty cold... She was currently walking home from school, wearing a light jacket over her school uniform that helped her top half stay warm... Her exposed legs? Not so lucky... The sky was filled with dark clouds, implying heavily that it would likely rain or snow soon... Jess was shivering as she walked... "I know I should probably head straight home... But I really want to run down to the book store to get another manga... I've put it off for days." Jess said to herself... She turned off course from her path home, walking instead to the local book store. She arrived there within a few minutes, entering the store... She gives a sigh of relief as she feels the warm air of the store slowly healing her of the cold outside world... She made her way to the manga section, smiling as she saw that what she was looking for was still there. "Thank goodness it's still in..." She said as she picked up the manga from the shelf. The book was titled 'Kitchen Princess Omnibus 2'... She opened the book excitedly, flipping through it to make sure all the pages were in tact and things like that... Oddly, she felt that the pages were a little damp... But she just brushed it off since it didn't damage it at all... Near the end of her flipping through the book, she wound up giving herself a paper cut on one of the damp pages, immediately feeling dizzy and sick... "W...What the hell..." She said, quickly holding a hand to her now aching head. "W-What was on those pages..." Jessica asked slowly... And then, she blacked out... Outside, it'd began to ____...
122221.title: Jessica Takai

1222211.content:
Outside, it'd began to snow as Jess passed out...

After who knows how long later, she began to slowly wake up... She sat up with a groan, holding a hand to her aching head... "W-What the?" She asked, looking around... She quickly forgot about her headache as she was faced with a new problem... IT WAS ABSOLUTELY FREEZING! She had no idea how she even got there, but she was in some kind of GIANT snowy forest, the lower half of her body buried in the snow... The cold was starting to hurt as her bare legs were extremely vulnerable to the cold, and being in a giant pile of snow wasn't helping. She screamed in pain at the cold, not even taking the time to notice that everything around her was giant... Or perhaps she was little? "HELP! SOMEBODY PLEASE HELP!" She called out, not wanting this to be the way she died...
1222211.title: Ice

12222111.content: Only a few seconds after Jess had called out fro help, she could hear footsteps quickly starting to move in her direction. "Hang on! I'm coming!" A female voice called as footsteps running in the snow could be heard, coming to her location... Jess waited there... And only a few seconds later, a figure came into view, sniffing at the ground and following Jess' smell to find her... And as Jess' eyes focus on the figure, she couldn't believe what she was seeing... A huge female Glaceon... Glaceon got closer and closer, until she eventually was right in front of Jess... "Oh my Arceus! Oh you poor little thing! Here, I'll get you out of there!" Glaceon said as she saw Jess... It was definitely the same voice that had called out to her... Glaceon then began using her front paws to begin digging Jess out from the snow... And eventually, Glaceon got Jess freed from the snow, her whole body being pale from the cold... Glaceon,thinking quickly, brought her head close to Jess... She opened her mouth wide, using her tongue to pull Jess inside! Once Jess was inside of Glaceon's mouth, laying on her tongue, the Pokemon closed her mouth around her... The inside of the Pokemon's mouth was very warm... But even so, Jess was quickly becoming scared of this location... And as for Glaceon...
12222111.title: Her Voice Was Heard

122221111.content: Glaceon was very careful to not swallow Jess' tiny form as she began walking off from that spot... Jess could do nothing to struggle, too busy shivering... Though, luckily, the warmth inside of Glaceon's mouth was starting to warm her up a little... Glaceon continued walking until she left the forest, arriving in some kind of small town... Most, if not all of the houses seemed to be cozy looking log cabins of differing sizes. In sight was a sign that originally read 'Welcome To Aurora Plains!' With icicles hanging from it. Though, somebody had vandalized the sign to read "Welcome To Snowdin!' instead... A few Pokemon were walking around outside. Namely a Lopunny, a Buneary, and a Frost Rotom. Glaceon walked through the town, getting a few waves from some Pokemon as she passed by... But being unable to speak, she simply nods in response... Eventually, she gets to an inn, walking into the door... Glaceon goes over to a lit fireplace in the main lobby, laying down in front of it... The heat of the warm fire was not only comfortable to Glaceon, but to the little Jess in her mouth as well... Glaceon---
122221111.title: She Doesn't Swallow

122221112.content: Glaceon tilts her head back, and with a single gulp, Jess was swallowed whole by the Pokemon... Jess managed a small scream as she felt herself being pulled into the Pokemon's stomach... And as she entered, she began to weakly squirm and struggle... "Please calm down... You're perfectly safe, I promise... I promise I'll let you out as soon as we get back to town, okay?" Glaceon said, giving her stomach a quick nuzzle... Glaceon didn't wait for an answer before she started to walk... If Jess had to think of a bright side to this, it would be that Glaceon's stomach was empty... Though, Jess was still afraid, continuing to squirm and struggle... Glaceon made her way out of the forest, entering a small looking town. Most, if not all of the buildings in town looked like cozy log cabins of different sizes, a few under construction. Glaceon made her way to a local inn, walking in through the door... "Welcome back. Enjoy your walk?" The Lopunny at the main desk asked. "I did, thank you." Glaceon said with a nod before heading upstairs to the next floor... She walked into a nearby bedroom, marked with the number '4'. Glaceon enters the room, laying down on the bed... The real question was, would she keep her promise to Jess or not?
122221112.title: She Swallows

12222112.content:
Jess tried to hold on as long as she could, but the cold would soon prove to be far too much for her... Soon, she passed out then and there... "This is really it... This is how I die..." Jess mutters to herself right before blacking out... As She muttered this, footsteps could be heard nearby, walking in the snow...

Much later, much to her own surprise, Jess began to slowly wake up... Time had passed, but she couldn't tell exactly how much... It could've been minutes, hours, even days... But she was no longer in that forest... She was in some kind of log cabin... And, like the forest, absolutely everything in there was giant... She had been laying on the coffee table, a piece of cloth that was the size of a large blanket to her being laid over her as she could both see and feel a crackling fire not too far away... The room seemed to be the livingroom, though it didn't seem like there were many other rooms in the place... Out a window, she could see snow falling, the very sight making her shiver as she wrapped up in the blanket... She quickly checked for her own pulse, making sure she wasn't dead... But no, she was alive... "S...Somebody saved me?" She asked herself...

"It would seem that way..." A large voice asked from the couch behind her... Jess quickly stiffened, too afraid to look behind her as she heard the large voice of somebody... The emotion in their voice sounded...
12222112.title: Her Voice Wasn't Heard

122221121.content:
The Pokemon sitting on the sofa behind Jess was quick to notice her fear... "Hey now, it's okay little one... I won't hurt you..." It said in a soft, feminine sounding voice... Jess was still very nervous, just by the size of the the voice alone... But after a few seconds, she began to hesitantly and slowly turn herself around... "There you go... See, you're okay..." The voice said, trying to make Jess feel more safe... Safe to say, Jess was pretty shocked when she saw the figure that was sat down on the couch behind her... A gaintess female Jynx... The Jynx smiled to Jess. "I'm glad to see that you're doing alright... I was worried there when I found you in the snow... You're a human, right? It's rare to find one of your kind around here..." The Jynx said, smiling kindly to Jess... Jess gives a nervous gulp as she saw the size of the Pokemon in front of her... "H-How did I get here?" Jess asked, looking around the room once more. "I just told you little one. I brought you here..." Jynx said... The Jynx then gently lifted up Jess, the blanket still wrapped around her, and placed her onto her lap. "Are you feeling better? I'd hate to have my new ____ feeling ill..." The Jynx asked...

Fill In The Blank...
122221121.title: Sweet and Kind

122221122.content: Jess gives a small nervous whimper, hearing the angered female voice of the Pokemon sitting on the couch behind her. "So tell me ya little shrimp... What's a human like you doing trespassing on MY territory? I don't exactly take kindly to trespassers..." The voice said... Jess gives one more nervous whimper before responding as best she could. "P-Please d-don't h-hurt me..." Jess said in a quiet and shaky voice... 'Why is this happening to me?! All I wanted to do was buy a book, and now I might die!' Jess thought to herself... "Don't hurt you? I'm tempted to cut you in half... But I'm a reasonable woman... So I guess we could work something out... If there wasn't something I wanted from you, I would've left you to die out there." The voice said followed by a chuckle... Jess slowly turns herself around to face her captor... And safe to say, she was pretty surprised by what she saw... Sitting there, on the sofa, was a giantess Weavile... "W-What do you want f-from me?" Jess asked in a small scared voice... Weavile replies "Oh, it's simple really... Humans are quite rare around these parts... Most Pokemon would kill to have one as their own... So as for what I'm gonna do with you? I'm gonna---
122221122.title: Upset and Kinda Mad

1222212.content:
Outside, it'd began to rain as Jess passed out...

After who know how long now, Jess was slowly beginning to wake up, groaning as she placed a hand on her aching head... The dizziness was gone now, but she still had a bit of a headache... But she quickly jolted awake as she saw her new surroundings... "W...What the..." She said, looking around from where she sat up... She was on what seemed to be a... A giant beach? She could feel a nice warm sun above her, nice warm sand below her, and hear the soothing sounds of the ocean... "Did I just die and go to heaven?" Jess asked, sounding more scared than anything at the thought she might've died in the book store... She quickly pinched herself to see if this was a dream... And then gave herself a gentle slap... Nope, this was all real... She then checked for a pulse... Yep, she was still alive... "W-Where am I?" She asked, standing up fully as she looked around... Of in the distance, she could see a sort of village, or town. All the buildings were made from wood and palm leaves... And there was a wooden sign by the entrance to the town that read 'Welcome To Coral Bay!' in big bubble letters... It was then she noticed the palm trees around, and the seashells on the ground... And looking at their sizes, she went pale as a ghost with fear... Either everything was really big, or she was really tiny...

She could then begin to hear a faint sound... The sound of feet shuffling through the sand... And chances were, whoever it was was far larger than she was!
1222212.title: Water

choices: Wait For Her To Notice You
12222121.content: Jess didn't try to hide, figuring that a living thing here could at least give her some answers... And before long, that creature came into view. Jess could hardly believe her eyes as she saw it come into view... It was a huge female Vaporeon... A POKEMON! How was that even possible?! If anything, Jess' surprise made it less likely for her to run and hide... Vaporeon didn't seem like she was at the beach for any major reason, just seeming to be on a nice walk... She was wearing a wristband made from pretty pink seashells (Or Would It Be An Anklet In This Case?), and was wearing a pair of Black Glasses to block out the sun... "Ah~ Nothing better than a nice walk on the beach after a nice meal~ The sand feels so nice between my toes~" The Vaporeon said with a smile, her voice making her sound to be in her mid-teens. She was walking in Jess' direction at the moment...
12222121.title: Look Around For The Creature

122221211.content: Jess knew she had to try to get the massive Pokemon's attention... But how? She simply decided to try the first thing that came to mind... She began running towards the massive Pokemon, and stopped once she felt she was close enough... She began quickly flailing her arms to try to get noticed... Though, do to the Black Glasses, Jess couldn't tell exactly where Vaporeon was even looking... "H-Hey! D-Down here! Look!" Jess tried calling up to Vaporeon... The Pokemon's ears twitch a small bit, and she was clearly looking around a bit... "Hmm? Did somebody say something?" Vaporeon asked. "Down here!" Jess called up again... Vaporeon heard it this time, looking right down at where Jess was... And Vaporeon immediately smiled at the sight. "Oh wow~ A human! Hi there~" Vaporeon said with a smile. She was scrunching her toes, enjoying the feeling of the sand between them still... "U-Um... H-Hi..." Jess said before going back to the important topic at hand, slightly intimidated by the massive Pokemon looking right at her. "D-Do you know how I got here?" Jess asked, looking into Vaporeon's eyes. "Hmm? That's a weird question... No I don't... But I know exactly where you're going~" Vaporeon said with a giggle... "H-Huh? A-And where's that?" Jess asked, getting ready to run if she had to... Vaporeon replies with---
122221211.title: Try To Get Her Attention

choices: Lowered Her Paw Back Onto Her
122221212.content: Jess decides to just stand where she is, and wait for Vaporeon to notice her instead of trying to get her attention... Jess didn't exactly know the reason for this choice, but there was just something in her gut that told her this was the right choice... She stood her ground as the massive Vaporeon came closer and closer, not having noticed Jessica as of yet... And by the time Jess realized she should probably move, it was too little too late... The Vaporeon was right in front of her, lifting her foot for another step... And when she took that next step, her foot landed right on top of Jess. It didn't crush her by any means, didn't even break any bones, but it was definitely heavy... Jess quickly began to squirm, trying to get out from under Vaporeon's paw... But it would seem this was exactly what caused Vaporeon to notice her... "Hmm? What's that?" Vaporeon asked, quickly lifting her paw up to see what she'd stepped on... "Ooooh~ A human! It's really rare to see one of you little things around here!" Vaporeon said with a smile... Jess was about to speak up, but before she could say anything, Vaporeon---
122221212.title: Wait For Her To Notice You

choices: Sit There And Let Herself Be Taken
12222122.content: Deciding she'd rather not encounter whatever was approaching her, Jess began quickly looking for a place to hide...Unfortunately being a beach, there weren't really any good places to hide in this area... Though, Jess did see one possible place to go... It was a conch shell laying in the sand close by. Jess quickly ran for it, hiding herself inside of the shell as fast as she could... She went as far back inside the shell as possible, still finding all of this hard to believe as she hoped to avoid detection... If she'd stayed out there, she would've seen exactly what was approaching her... It was a giantess female Buizel. This Buizel was wearing a necklace made from pretty pink seashells, and had a hand-made basket in her hand that she was using to gather seashells in... She was humming to herself happily as she was going about, collecting whatever shells she could find on the beach... And of course, she eventually found the conch that Jess was hiding in. "Oooh~ This is a pretty one! I bet I could charge a good amount for it!" The Buizel said cheerfully as she lifted up the shell, causing Jess to yelp a little... The Buizel's voice made her sound like her age was around her early teens... 13 or 14 most likely... Jess could see that Buizel was lowering the shell into her basket... She had to make a choice, NOW!
12222122.title: Quickly Try To Hide

choices: Try To Get Out Of The Shell
122221221.content: Jess, deciding to continue staying hidden, remained in her hiding spot within the shell... And Buizel placed the conch into the basket of other shells. Jess could still see the hole she'd come in through, able to see some of the outside surrounding because of it. "Welp, guess that's all of 'em!" Buizel said, smiling... She then began making her way from the beach, to the little village Jess had seen in the distance... As Buizel arrived, she began walking through the sandy streets of the little town, humming happily to herself as she did so. She was likely on her way somewhere... And while Jess couldn't see them, she could hear that Buizel was passing by several other Pokemon as she walked through the streets, a few greeting her as she passed by...
122221221.title: Sit There And Let Herself Be Taken

122221222.content: Jess, not wanting to be taken by this giant Pokemon, quickly made a run for the opening in the shell she'd come in through. And once she made it there, she took a running leap out (or at least tried to take a running leap), resulting in her realizing just how poor of a choice that may have been... At her size compared to everything else, this drop was MASSIVE! And she was plummeting right to the sandy ground below. But it would seem Buizel had noticed her falling from the shell, and took action quickly. She dropped her basket, and the conch, trying to catch Jess as she was falling to the ground... And luckily for Jess, she finds herself being saved right on time, mere inches from the ground when Buizel managed to catch her in her hands... paws? I honestly don't know if Buizel has hands or paws, so I'm just gonna say paws...Buizel gave a relieved sigh as she saved Jess... "Are you okay? You could've been really hurt..." Buizel asked as she lifted Jess up. She raised her to eye level, beginning to examine the girl... Jess doesn't reply, not knowing what to say to the massive Pokemon..."Can you talk?" Buizel asks...
122221222.title: Try To Jump Out

choices: Sorry but I want another one

122222.title: A Different Character Please

1222221.content:
You felt cold. You couldn't move your body intact not even your eyes. Well you can except your eye lids are closed. You didn't start to freeze but then you felt something strange happen to you. You then started falling up? The wind went past you. That's when your eyes opened and your body move. You saw yourself falling down towards nothing. You felt heat kept warming you up. You felt like you were in a comet. You felt like screaming but you didn't burn as if your body was covered with water.
You then stop! You started to move and move but you never got anywhere. You felt like your the only eye that is opened is your minds eye. You open your real eyes and see that you are
1222221.title: Waking up

choices: Use the Giant pillow as a landing
Wait for someone to come.  You hope.
12222211.content: "Where am I?" You said. There was a sheet covering your body and your head resting on a piece of cotton? You hen try to get out of bed, luckily the sheet that was covering you was the sheet underneath the heavy sheets. You stand up and see a picture frame with a (blank). You then see words saying 'Home sweet home'. You the. Come to the conclusion that you're in someone's house. Everything in this house was huge like you were in Jack and the Beanstalk. You started to become scared. Did someone find you? Did you appear here? Did you shrink? You get out your emergency phone that your parents gave you in case you were in trouble (The phone is kinda of like the ladybug phone from Diary of a Wimpy Kid mixed with the Receiver phone from Earthbound). You hit the home button and try to see if your parents will answer. It doesn't work. You hit the phone which either is for your mom or dad phone. It still didn't answer. Wherever you were you couldn't call your parents. You needed to find out where you were. You looked over the edge of the bed it was very high and you didn't want to fall. You thought of staying in bed but you felt more scared with that option.
12222211.title: Home

122222111.content:
You just had to find a way out but the bed's too high, making it impossible to jump down without dying. You needed something to break your fall. You look at the giant pillow and decide to use that. You tried pulling on it but you instead got the covering from it. You try again and after pulling to the edge you push it off the edge onto the floor. You look down at the pillow. Will this save you from falling to your death? You thought this could be a dream and that if you fall to down you'll wake up. You then thought those two were pretty good. But if it wasn't a dream, were you in some giants house? You look down and say to yourself, "Ok Stephane you can do this."
You put your foot over the edge and then you fall. "Aaaaahhhhhh!!!" You screamed. You then felt the pillow when you landed to the ground. You sighed in relief. You hope that you won't have to do that again. You walk off the pillow and look for the door. You found it and saw light protruding from the door. You saw the little underway easy to crawl through.
When you get out you then hear talking. You ran through this long hallway into a kitchen. Where you saw...
122222111.title: On the ground

choices: You then hear a large stop behind you.  It was their son.

She steps forward, quivering if these Lucarios will be nice or not. But they did bring her so maybe their nice. When you got close to the you...
1222221111.title: Lucario's the big pokemon

info.brief_description: You wake up on an Island populated by giant pokemon. Luckily you make a very big friend.
info.description:
Hello welcome to my first interactive story.
Outline
Ok you are a human that finds himself/herself in an alternate dimension that is inhabited only by giant pokemon. Luckily for you you are found by a pokemon that is friendly and wants to help you find your way home. Together with your larger then life friend you have many adventures, make lots of friends, and fight many foes.

Details
The story takes place on Emerald Island, home to all pokemon from 1st Gen to 4th Gen (and some 5th gen). Many locations on Emerald Island include:
Pokeyo
Gem Stone Town
Happiness Valley (normal types)
Lava Springs (fire types)
Coral Bay (water types)
Verdant Forest (grass types)
Thnderbolt Fealds (electric types)
Aurora Planes (ice types)
Fury Falls (fighting types)
The Smog Lands (poison types)
Drill Horn Caverns (Ground types)
Hi-wind Hills (flying types)
Eon Valley (psychic types)
Cocoon Cave (bug types)
Megaton Peak (rock types)
Hollow Manor (ghost types)
Mystic Grove (dragon types)
Lunar Town (dark types)
Iron Head Isle (steel types)
(Note: any pokemon can visit any location regardless of type)
All the pokemon on the Island can talk ,plus they can use all the moves they can learn and special moves from other worlds (moves from TV, Games, and even some madeup moves). Also there is a pokemon school where they go and learn basics like math, reading, and writing but also battle related classes like battle strategies 101, dungeon exploration101,and gym battles.

Story Rules
1: I want people to be able to add thier own characters to the story, when you do add a character give a short bio on his/her name, looks, personality, likes, and dislikes (note if you make a character please add on to its story), after that you can start his/her story but, please leave the option to make a new character so others can start.
2: please alow others to add to your story but, if there is a part of the story that you whant to add specifically to please leave a + on the end of that choice.
3: please don't start the story with a legedary pokemon, you can meet them later on in your story but not a the very begining.
4: This is a kid friendly story so no inappropriate material, references, and try to keep language mild.
5: The pokemon in this story are normal so no anthro pokemon.
6: The pokemon don't eat each other but there are nonpokemon fish that they can eat.
7: None of the characters are to die in this story, you can put the characters in dangerous situations but they must survive.
8: Your character can transform in to a Pokemon if you want.
9: As long as you follow the rules above you can take the story in any direction you want, so feel free to add any additional characters or locations as you wish.
10:Have fun : )
